Test Automation Engineer - English speaking (REF1532Z) (Budapest)
Test Automation Engineer - English speaking (REF1532Z) (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions
Alapvető elvárások
Gyártás, műszaki terület
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Középfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - felsőfokú
The largest ICT employerin Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH)is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary’s independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sitesin Budapest, Debrecen, Pécs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Test Automation Engineer - English speaking (REF1532Z)
Tasks:
Support for pragmatic implementation, review und quality assurance of NextMagentaCloud customisation architecture.
You will work with a highly talented multidisciplinary team of Engineers who design, develop, test, and deploy well-architected software solutions that are reliable, secure, high-performing, scalable, maintainable and evolvable.
Setting up an automated and integrated test environment for testing and simulation of a NextCloud instance.
Working as a software test engineer across the full development stack for our products and services.
Clarification of requirements and development of concepts for relevant software testing activities.
Support team in continiously developing the skills of yourself and your colleagues
Creation and maintenance of software documentation using ASCII doc
Working in international teams across Europe.
Requirements:
≥3 years proven experience in SW testing, especially in automation and test automation
Deep knowledge in programming languages like Php, Python, Javascript;
Knowledge in IP technology and operation system (LINUX)
Fluent language skills in English (oral and written)
server-side business logic testing
some experience with JSON APIs and object-relational mapping database frameworks
SQL
Any Cloud experience, preferably AWS experience, openstack
Authentication/authorisation techniques, if possible OAuth2/OpenID connect
Unit testing
ISTQB certification
Nice to have:
Web development: HTTP, Javascript, SCC, HTML
vue.js or Angular
Senior
* Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest, Debrecen, Szeged, Pécs

Senior Solution Engineer (GitOps) (REF1597A) (Budapest)
Senior Solution Engineer (GitOps) (REF1597A) (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
távmunka, home office
angol - középfokú
The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary’s independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, Pécs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Senior Solution Engineer (GitOps) (REF1597A)
Job Summary/Briefing:
We are looking for a Senior Solution Engineer to join us and support our growing customer base and their business needs!
Who are we? We, as Open Telekom Cloud Managed Services provide a service to manage the customer's infrastructure and software components (OS, application, middleware and database) with a highly standardized portfolio.
We provide End-to-End support for our customers from a central management environment and enhancing the platform (OTC) capabilities. We enable our main platform to switch from compute offerings to a solution based offering by integrating our services to new or existing customer landscapes.
We provide support in the office time and on on-call duty as our services are running 24/7.
About your role in our organization:
The OTC Tribe contains 150+ employees including platform operations, service management, overhead roles and also our colleagues.
We, OTC Managed Services are a smaller team working on top of the platform and we have 8 colleagues (Operations, Engineering, Architects, Processes, Product Owner).
As a senior engineer, you will bring in a fresh view and new ideas to improve our services and help our development with recommendations.
You will be assigned to more complex issues, develop the associated low-level designs, and then implement these solutions or delegate to our operation team supervised by our Lead Architect.
You do not have to be a master of everything regarding the below listed tools and technologies, but it is required to have the needed seniority and experience with enterprise solutions and at least know the tools, plus have in depth experience with at least a few of them.
Main focus is on container based operation and tools are marked below, especially Kubernetes and the related tools used for operation.
Description about the used tools, needed skills and requirements:
First of all, we would except a general professional interest in IT and regarding newer tools, technologies. We are looking for a friendly and communicative person to help others in the team develop theirselves further, bring in recommendations and new ideas.
Our services are cloud based and running on Linux (Redhat / Debian / Ubuntu based), Windows (Windows Server 2016 / 2019 / 2022) and OTC’s CCE (Cloud Container Engine).
Based on these, a strong knowledge regarding the IT basics is a must (cloud computing, operating systems, networking, databases, etc).
Container technologies:
Docker and Kubernetes - deeper knowledge is needed mainly for operation. Currently we are using OTC’s CCE (Cloud Container Engine) which is OTC’s Kubernetes based managed container solution.
Our future plan is to build our own Kubernetes solution based on compute resources. It’s a great plus if you have experience also in designing and building up Kubernetes based infrastructures in an enterprise environment.
We are in the middle of shifting our way of working to GitOps lately.
The toolset currently we are working with (marked where currently we lack of in-depth competence and experience in the team):
ArgoCD (*)
Rancher (*)
Helm-chart
GitLab
Terraform
Ansible (*)
Packer by HashiCorp (*)
Keycloack
Zabbix
Grafana
Elasticsearch/ECK (*)
Confluence
JIRA
A little (or more) coding experience is nice to have with languages like Go or Python. Some of our automation or scripts are currently in Go.
Experience and knowledge in database operation (MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL, or MSSQL) is nice to have.
Requirements:
At least 3-5 years of Solution Engineer or similar experience working with the above listed technologies.
Knowledge and proved experience with Cloud operation and technologies (operation with High Availability, Clusterization, Hybrid Cloud operation, Cloud native operation, CMDB, etc.)
Experience in GitOps is a big plus.
An average/moderate but confident English language knowledge is a must.
Senior
* Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest, Debrecen, Szeged, Pécs

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary’s independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, Pécs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
DevOps Engineer for Business application within AWS (REF1577I)
The Digital Hub NTO (Network, Transformation & Optimisation) stands for the transformation and optimization of the access network in DTAG's fixed network. His goal is to improve the end customer's experience through increased bandwidth and products, while at the same time efficiently deploying the workforce to operate these networks.
Tasks:
Responsibility for the technical solution of the AWS / Container - service architecture within the NTO Agile Release Train
Hire and define relevant technical enablers
Coordination, advice and training of the system team
Close coordination with the program level of the Agile Release Train
Close cooperation with the product owners in the hub
Significant design of the technical solutions used
Participation in shaping the product vision from the point of view of the technical enablers.
Participate in and conduct agile ceremonies at the program level.
Significant contribution in the context of Relentless Improvement
Support in capacity management of the necessary resources
Skills:
Experience as a DevOps Engineer or similar software engineering role
Proficient with CI/CD pipelines
Good knowledge on Containerization
Knowledge on any mayor Cloud like AWS
Good knowledge of Python and Terraform
Working knowledge of databases and SQL
Fluent English knowledge
Senior
* Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest, Debrecen, Szeged, Pécs

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary’s independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, Pécs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Network Automation Engineer (REF1561J)
DNA (Drive Network Automation) is an initiative which unites several projects which are building a technology-savvy platform used across different instances and domains intended for automation and orchestration of network elements, services and network functions. MDO stands for MultiDomain Orchestrator - the platform that orchestrates networks across various domains.We are looking for Network Engineers with different level of telecommunication experience from juniors to architects, who are interested in joining the team of leading industry experts driving Network Automation and Orchestration initiatives within Deutsche Telekom and its subsidiary national telecom operators
Experience in defining and maintaining complex data modelsExperience in object-oriented programming with Python or similar languagesExperience in developing of restful API’s (e.g. TMF…)Version management of software and configuration artifacts (e.g. GIT, MCICD…)Good knowledge of the conception and development of automation technologies and solutions (orchestration, service modelling).Basic knowledge of networking (e.g. WAN / LAN / routing / 5G slicing)Application (software packages and configurations)Container (software packages and configurations)Knowledge of operational processes in a telco: in fulfillment, assurance, operation support & readiness, ITIL processesTechnical understanding of telecommunications infrastructureService & Resource Lifecycle ManagementEnglish spoken and written (Level B2)Advantages:Data and status models according to e.g. TMF-SIDMarkup languages such as YAML, JSONDescription standards such as TOSCA, YANG Experience in configuration of key telecommunication service processes: OSR, assurance and fulfilment in modern transport networksTest-Driven development (TDD)Model based AutomationWorkflow (e.g. BPMN, CAMUNDA)DevOps mindsetGerman language
Experienced
* Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.

Budapest, Szeged, Pécs, Debrecen

Szoftverfejlesztési csoportvezető (indusztrializáció) (Budapest)
Szoftverfejlesztési csoportvezető (indusztrializáció) (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Thyssenkrupp
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
középvezető
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
távmunka, home office
angol - középfokú
A thyssenkrupp egy nemzetközi vállalatcsoport, amely nagyrészt független ipari és technológiai üzletágakból tevődik össze, és világszerte 96 000 embert foglalkoztat. A 2021/22-es pénzügyi évben 48 országban 41 milliárd eurós árbevételt ért el. A széleskörű technológiai know-how-ra támaszkodva az üzletágak költséghatékony és erőforrás-kímélő megoldásokat fejlesztenek a jövő kihívásaira, különösen az éghajlatvédelem, az energetikai transzformáció, az ipar digitális átalakulása és a jövő mobilitása terén.
Magyarországi kompetencia központunkban közel 1000 fős mérnökcsapatunkkal innovatív partnerként vagyunk jelen az autóipar egyik leggyorsabban és legizgalmasabban fejlődő szegmensében, az elektromechanikus kormányrendszerek területén. Kiemelkedő minőségű, high-tech fejlesztéseinkkel neves autógyárak igényeit elégítjük ki, fejlesztéseink pedig a világszerte autóba szerelt kormányrendszerek 25 százalékában megtalálhatóak. Mérnökeink olyan ma még nem létező megoldásokon is dolgoznak, amelyek megváltoztathatják az autóipar jövőjét.
Szoftverfejlesztési csoportvezető (indusztrializáció)
Feladatok
A szoftverfejlesztési csapat koordinálása
A fejlesztési munkacsomagok részfeladatokra bontása a csapattagok számára
Feladatkiosztás a kapott prioritások, feladatfüggőségek és a csapattagok szakértelme alapján
A csoport szakmai és szervezési támogatása
Belső tudás megosztásának biztosítása
Kapcsolattartás más osztályokkal
Elvárások
Felsőfokú végzettség mérnöki vagy IT területen
Csoport- vagy projektvezetői tapasztalat
Fejlesztői tapasztalat (beágyazott C)
Folyékony angolnyelv-tudás (szóban, írásban)
Kiváló kommunikációs készség
Kiváló szervező és problémamegoldó képesség
Széleskörű szoftver és rendszer ismeretek
Előnyök
SVN, JIRA toolok, illetve CAN és FlexRay protokollok ismerete
Amit kínálunk
A XI. kerületben található modern irodaházunkban kreatív környezetben dolgozhatsz, ahol sok színes közösségi tér, saját moziterem és egy skybar is vár
Rugalmas munkaidővel és home office lehetőséggel támogatunk (a legtöbb területen a havi munkaidő 60%-a)
Versenyképes fizetést és széleskörű juttatásokat (cafeteria és bónusz) biztosítunk számodra
Részese lehetsz egy sikeres, gyorsan növekvő technológiai vállalatnak
Új nyelveket tanulhatsz nálunk (5 nyelv közül választhatsz)
Szabadidős programokon kapcsolódhatsz ki (társasjátékok, sportolási lehetőség)
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest
Thyssenkrupp Components Technology Hungary Ltd. Daróczi str. 1-3., H-1113 Budapest   |  Phone: +36 (1) 505-9159  |  Fax: +36 (1) 505-9101  |  www.thyssenkrupp.hu

Cloud Software Architect for Microsoft Azure (REF1512U) (Budapest)
Cloud Software Architect for Microsoft Azure (REF1512U) (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary’s independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, Pécs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Cloud Software Architect for Microsoft Azure (REF1512U)
Your job
You love to own a problem and are creative in resolving it in a scalable way, collaborating with a talented, really nice and honest team of cloud engineers
You enjoy creating functional and technical designs for cloud operations at scale, breaking them down for implementation by cloud engineers. This includes taking technological, architectural, and design decisions, often jointly with product owner, developers, and other stakeholders
You participate in software design meetings, creating architectural plans, gathering requirements and exploring edge cases
You see documentation of your designs as a useful method so engineers know what to implement and so we can refer to them later
You create high and detailed level designs, establishing proof of concept environment
You develope manual and automated landscape deployments and validations, integrating with CI/CD pipelines
When designing you always have the complete customer experience and set of services in mind (no customer-specific solutions)
You are not afraid of starting from scratch, and you are also good at improving existing implementations
You have state-of-the-art knowledge in the software engineering process and are committed to further developing the quality of software development
You can get the team behind your ideas while being open for others’ ideas
You proactively drive the topics of the day, organise, and facilitate meetings
You see yourself at eye level with all team members and stakeholders, no matter who they are and where they come from, appreciating their respective expertise
You contribute to maintaining the product roadmap (customer-facing features as well as any technical debt)
You support our revenue contribution and OKR business goals
Your skills and profile
You are a perfect match if you love to dream big and take responsibility for making these dreams come true
You have an ownership mindset and a getting-things-done attitude
Systems thinking is your go-to approach
Microsoft Azure and Azure DevOps is your home turf
Deep understanding of the entire developement lifecycle (designing, developing, testing, deploying, monitoring)
Understanding of current software architecture and design patterns (clean architecture, microservices, etc)
You are really experienced in coding and scripting in PowerShell, Python and .NET
You value inner clarity as a means to make your point with confidence
Demonstrating knowledge by holding Proof Of Concepts, presenting on public events
You love to temporarily work directly with our customers
You are fluent in spoken and written English
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest, Debrecen, Szeged, Pécs

A thyssenkrupp egy nemzetközi vállalatcsoport, amely nagyrészt független ipari és technológiai üzletágakból tevődik össze, és világszerte 96 000 embert foglalkoztat. A 2021/22-es pénzügyi évben 48 országban 41 milliárd eurós árbevételt ért el. A széleskörű technológiai know-how-ra támaszkodva az üzletágak költséghatékony és erőforrás-kímélő megoldásokat fejlesztenek a jövő kihívásaira, különösen az éghajlatvédelem, az energetikai transzformáció, az ipar digitális átalakulása és a jövő mobilitása terén.
Magyarországi kompetencia központunkban közel 1000 fős mérnökcsapatunkkal innovatív partnerként vagyunk jelen az autóipar egyik leggyorsabban és legizgalmasabban fejlődő szegmensében, az elektromechanikus kormányrendszerek területén. Kiemelkedő minőségű, high-tech fejlesztéseinkkel neves autógyárak igényeit elégítjük ki, fejlesztéseink pedig a világszerte autóba szerelt kormányrendszerek 25 százalékában megtalálhatóak. Mérnökeink olyan ma még nem létező megoldásokon is dolgoznak, amelyek megváltoztathatják az autóipar jövőjét.
Hardverfejlesztő mérnök (Veszprém)
Feladatok
Elektronikai vezérlőegység (ECU) tervezése és fejlesztés a prototípustól a sorozatgyártásig
Vezérlőelektronika- és szenzorkövetelmények, rendszertervek készítése
Kapcsolási rajzok és nyomtatott áramkörök tervezése
Vezérlőelektronika- és szenzortesztek tervezése, kivitelezése
Hibaanalízis, műszaki problémák megoldása
Mérési eredmények dokumentálása, kiértékelése, prezentálása
Elvárások
Villamosmérnök végzettség vagy hasonló területen szerzett tapasztalat
Áramkörtervezői és -szimulációs tapasztalat
Elektronikai mérésekben való jártasság
Középfokú angolnyelv-tudás (szóban, írásban)
Analitikus gondolkodás és problémamegoldás
Csapatjátékos hozzáállás
Előnyök
Nyomtatott áramkörök tervezésében, beágyazott rendszerek fejlesztésében szerzett tapasztalat
Amit kínálunk
Rugalmas munkaidővel és home office lehetőséggel támogatunk (a legtöbb területen a havi munkaidő 60%-a)
Versenyképes fizetést és széleskörű juttatásokat (cafeteria és bónusz) biztosítunk számodra
Részese lehetsz egy sikeres, gyorsan növekvő technológiai vállalatnak
Új nyelveket tanulhatsz nálunk (5 nyelv közül választhatsz)
Szabadidős programokon kapcsolódhatsz ki (társasjátékok, sportolási lehetőség)

Cyber Security Analyst Tier2 (REF196L) (Budapest)
Cyber Security Analyst Tier2 (REF196L) (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Középfokú végzettség
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary’s independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, Pécs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Cyber Security Analyst Tier2 (REF196L)
Security monitoring in SIEM (Security Information and Event Management), EDR (Endpoint Detection and Response) and other sourcesInvestigate, review and triage alerts and identify real threats from false positivesCreate incidents for potential attacksFine-tune rules in collaboration with content engineering teamRegular participation in cyber review meetings with the customers’ IT security teams to discuss the escalated incidents, issues, and fine-tuning suggestionsSupport and mentor the L1 Analyst team in daily operationGenerate reports for both technical and non-technical staff and stakeholdersBe up-to-date on the latest threats in IT.
IT Security experienceTechnical knowledge and experience with at least one well-known SIEM or security analytics solutionSolid knowledge of Windows and Linux operation systemsGeneral knowledge of web security, network protocols, devices, services, and related technologies (Firewall, IPS/IDS, web proxy)Understanding of host-based security tools such as anti-virus and EDRIT Security Certificate(s) (CompTIA, EC-Council or equivalent)Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, ability to analyze logs of various devices, solutionsReliable English communication skills (both written and verbal)AdvantagesPrevious SOC experienceExperience with EDR solutionsExperience with ICS, OT and IoT security solutionsVendor certificates (IBM, Microsoft, Splunk, CrowdStrike or equivalent)Any advanced security certificate (GSEC, OSCP/OSCE or equivalent)Basic presentation, project management, document management skillsGerman communication skills
Experienced
* Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest, Debrecen, Pécs, Szeged

Software Engineer in networking Lab enviroment (TC Core/Technik HU) (REF225Q) (Budapest)
Software Engineer in networking Lab enviroment (TC Core/Technik HU) (REF225Q) (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Középfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Present in the market under the Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions brand name, IT-Services Hungary (ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group and is the largest ICT employer in Hungary. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary’s independent survey and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, Pécs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team. 
Software Engineer in networking Lab enviroment (TC Core/Technik HU) (REF225Q)
As a Software engineer, we give you the opportunity to experiment with the latest Cisco, Juniper, Huawei, Adtran devices in the design and developing of new networks, reaching a huge Telekom site with cutting edge devices from a distance and using the opportunities in the largest remote laboratory of Deutsche Telekom. 
We have several open positions with the following criterias:
Tasks:
Full definition, preparation (High and low level lab design), follow-up, validation and documentation of test results
Test and measuring devices and lab infrastructure requirements and test automation by scripts
Using of Network Domain Orchestratorrel Automation
Gradual involvement in network planning, Review design documents from Planning or Engineering, modify and improve for lab architecture 
Configuration, customizing, and implementation of customized solutions for projects. 
Analysis of functional and technical requirements for software, platforms, and infrastructure 
Technical support of test projects 
Maintenance of planning and design documentation 
Participation in projects for the whole life cycle of the projects 
Description/Creation/Revision of test cases Automation of test cases Specification of product features environment (Python)
FTTB, BNG based L2/L3 based mass market and individual products (Skills: Gherkin/Cucumber) 
Requirements
Cisco CCNP exam or equivalent knowledge and relevant experience
Juniper exam or experience
Intermediate level English knowledge
Python with framework Django, with modules aiohttp and asyncio
Know-how, and some experience with container orchestration systems like Kubernetes and/ or Docker
Knowledge of data modeling (YANG, XSLT, Swagger) and interface design (JSON, XML, REST, OpenAPI) is desirable
Jira, Gitlab knowhow or relevant experience
CI/CD knowhow
Gherkin and Cucumber knowhow
Java, Javascript knowhow
Basic knowhow about Test Automation Framework (TAF)
Accurate and thorough work, inclination to learn, teamwork 
Json knowhow or relevant experience
SQL database knowhow
Vmware experience
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest
Jelentkezem az állásra ›

Present in the market under the Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions brand name, IT-Services Hungary (ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group and is the largest ICT employer in Hungary. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary’s independent survey and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, Pécs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team. 
AWS Architect - REF341L
As a Senior AWS Solution Architect & Senior AWS Cloud Consultant you fulfill the following tasks:
You research and analyze available tools and frameworks and then implement those as cloud-native solutions for our customers
You assist the T-Systems Public Cloud Product Management Team to build and define solutions on top of AWS based on customer and market feedback
You support the customer engagement lifecycle from pre-sales to implementation and identify and support follow-up activities
You participate in or lead technical workshops as a cloud expert with partners and clients and implement Pilot and Proof of Concept projects
You advise clients on architecture methods, governance and the use of cloud-native best practices
You will run Well-Architected Reviews on customer workloads advising the customer on AWS best practices 
You will review existing customer environments, plan and implement migrations to AWS cloud by applying appropriate migration strategy (Relocate, Rehosting, Refactoring etc.) 
You develop automated cloud-native solutions following the IaC approach using appropriate AWS services, such as Lambda, Step Functions, Terraform, Cloudformation (including higher-level provision options like SAM or CDK)
You are responsible for expanding and improving the solution portfolio and you develop new features, templates and documentation 
You act as a coach and mentor for young and new team members
You take over technical sub-project management responsibility as a sparring partner between business and IT in interdisciplinary teams.
Independent steering of error analysis and problem-solutions together with the operation in the DevOps teams
You work in a highly dynamic, international environment with a highly motivated team
Requirements
Next to a degree in computer science or another technical discipline, you have at least 5 years of experience in two or more of the following areas: software development, automation and containers, design & implementation of distributed cloud applications, agile methodologies
You have 2+ years of working experience with a hyperscaler cloud platform (preferably AWS)
Solid working experience in four or more of the listed technology areas: Relational Databases, Programming, Web Technologies, Security, Networking, Migration, Big Data, Machine Learning or Artificial Intelligence
You bring experience in AWS services for example Amazon EC2 compute, AWS Lambda, AWS EventBridge, AWS CloudWatch, Amazon RDS, Amazon ECS
Extensive experience in DevOps methodologies and automation with Shell Scripting, Docker, Terraform, Ansible, and more
You bring experience in development with NodeJS, Python, Java or another common programming language
You are experienced with complex, large scale environments and able to design a resilient, secured, and performant cloud infrastructure solution
Demonstrated experience developing an enterprise-scale distributed applications using modern software development practices and technologies is highly desired
Ideally, you have already client-facing experiences
Strong communication skills in English
Flexibility and readiness to travel occasionally are expected
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary’s independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, Pécs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Qlik Sense/ Qlik View Developer (REF1602F)
This goes out to all experienced Qlik Professionals, who are eager to participate in a challenging, multinational analytics project, build with state of the art technologies!
Join our team, to design and implement a modern Qlik reporting solution for a german premium car manufacturers.
If you feel well in an agile environment and if you enjoy having direct customer contact, you are the right fit.
Tasks:
Gather and analyze customers business requirements
Design and Implement Reports and Dashboards in accordance with customers expectations and design guidelines
Perform functional tests and regression tests
Present work results to the customer
Optimize Report / Dashboard performance
Generate new customer demands by disclosing optimization potentials and other added values to the business department
Requirements
You have a minimum 3 years of experience with QlikSense (preferred) or QlikView
You have very good SQL skills
You've gained first-hand experiences with the relevant AWS-Cloud Services (S3 Storage, Athena, Lambda)
You are familiar with modern file-formats like ORC, Parquet, JSON, etc.
You have strong English communication skills (min. B2 Level)
You have an affinity for logistics and automotive topics
You are reliable, customer- and quality-oriented, and a good team-player
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest, Debrecen, Pécs, Szeged

Line Security Manager (REF1562S) (Budapest)
Line Security Manager (REF1562S) (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions
Alapvető elvárások

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary’s independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, Pécs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Line Security Manager (REF1562S)
Tasks:
Initiate, control, evaluate and assure quality of IT Security KPI’s
Reporting based on business requirements
Creation, coordination and tracking of security measures
Regular updating of documentation (e.g. work instructions, manuals, customer documentation)
Change approval of customer and internal requests in ServiceNow ticketing system
Preparation and support during Audits (ISAE3402, SOC2, Customer Audits, Internal Audits, etc.)
Support service chain OPM and SDM with respect to security issues and Control of operational units
Ensure that T-Systems’ IT Security Standards requirements are known, commissioned and implemented
Prepare and conduct regular steering meetings internally  with operational staff and Security Management.
Support customer-related security events and security incidents in collaboration with operational teams.
Support development and implementation of T-Systems’ IT Security requirements 
What our team can offer: 
Supportive, bondable team
Cooperation with international team in Germany, Slovakia and India
Requirements:
At least 2 years of proven professional experience in an operational IT area or a comparable activity or other such industry based regulation of security controls
Information Security basics knowledge / experience
Understand security issues related to confidentiality, integrity, and availability of security services,
Professional behavior  towards internal units and customer
Strong in communication skills
English knowledge
Knowledge of ITIL IT-Service Management,
Able to work under pressure (e.g. during security incidents),
Good methodical and analytical knowledge
Ability to work in complex working environment
Advantages:
German knowledge
Enterprise architecture framework knowledge
Any level of IT Security certificate(s) (CompTIA, EC-Council, CISA/CISM, CISSP, ISO27001, etc)
Personality:
Self-dependence and responsibility
Flexibility
Team-player attitude
Problem solving skills
Experienced
* Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest, Debrecen, Szeged, Pécs

SAP FI-CO Supporter (Budapest)
SAP FI-CO Supporter (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Thyssenkrupp
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
távmunka, home office
angol - középfokú
thyssenkrupp is an international group of companies comprising largely independent industrial and technology businesses and employing 96,000 people. Across 48 countries it generated sales of €41 billion in fiscal year 2021/22. Backed by extensive technological know-how, the businesses develop cost-effective and resource-friendly solutions to the challenges of the future, especially in the fields of climate protection, the energy transition, digital transformation in the industry and mobility of the future.
In the Hungarian development center with our engineering team of 1000 we are present as an innovative and significant partner in one of the fastest growing and most exciting segment of the automotive industry, in the field of electromechanical steering systems. With outstanding quality and high-tech developments we meet the needs of renowned car manufacturers and our developments can be found in 25 % of the manufactured cars all over the world. Our engineers work on new challenges that can change the future of automotive.
SAP FI-CO Supporter
Feladatok
SAP R/3 and S/4 FI/CO module support / ticketing
Customizing of FI/CO modules
Contribution to international projects
Writing development specifications, documentation, testing and implementation
Business development, change management
Authorization management
Elvárások
3 years+ FI/CO experience
Founded knowledge of finance, accounting and controlling business processes
Understanding ABAP code and debugging
University or college degree
Good level of English
Willingness to travel (10%)
Ability to work independently
Effective communication
Advantages:
ABAP development skill is a plus
German knowledge
Knowledge of FI/CO related modules (MM, PP, SD, PS)
Amit kínálunk
A modern office in the 11th district is waiting for you to support your creativity with fun community places, cafe rooms, an own cinema and a skybar
You can be part of a successful and growing company in the field of technology
We support you with flexible working hours and home office opportunity (60 % of the working time in many of our positions)
Competitive salary and wide range of other benefits (cafeteria & bonus) are provided to you
You can learn new languages in small groups, selecting from 5 languages
We organize leisure time activities (board games, sport activities)
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest
Thyssenkrupp Components Technology Hungary Ltd. Daróczi str. 1-3., H-1113 Budapest   |  Phone: +36 (1) 505-9159  |  Fax: +36 (1) 505-9101  |  www.thyssenkrupp.hu

Azure Migration Engineer (REF1379T) (Budapest)
Azure Migration Engineer (REF1379T) (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary’s independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, Pécs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Azure Migration Engineer (REF1379T)
About us
As Cloud Migration Services (CMS) part of T-Systems, we are specializing at accompanying our customers on their Cloud adoption journey. Whether it’s a transition from different Cloud or it’s their first time moving from on premises to Cloud, we are there for them to safely guide them through all stages of their transformation because we understand what it takes to become a part of a digital future with innovative solutions.
Our mission: Shaping the safest, easiest and most efficient transformation to a digitized and cloud-native future together with our customer.
Your Tasks:
As the Cloud Migration Engineer, you will be executing the migration & transformation strategy for our customers as part of an agile migration team, headed by the Migration Architect. Among your main responsibilities you will be performing migrations from On-Premises to Azure and from any Cloud to Azure migrations, utilizing the most efficient tools available. You will be also creating relevant documentation, defining migration plans and processes, performing landscape deployments (both manual and automated).
Perform various migrations between Clouds or from On-Premises to Cloud based on customers’ requirements and needs, focusing on Azure
Create, define & improve processes and plans related to migration
Work in an international environment and with customer representatives in the migration team, while serving as the technology expert
Collaborate with T-systems Internal and External partners
Participate in the roadmap implementation and feedback to the product team
Directly communicate with end customers to discuss possibilities of migration, transformation and their optimal designs
Your Profile:
We are looking for someone with an ambitious spirit who is keen to make a positive impact for our partners. You are a team player and always ready to learn technologies and ready to support enterprises to adopt public cloud. In addition, you ideally bring the following with you:
1 or 2+ years of relevant work experience with Azure cloud technologies, with basic certifications (AZ-900, AZ-104)
Understanding of Infrastructure as Code (IaC) and automation possibilities (Terraform, ARM templates, Pulumi)
General ICT skills (Networking, OS, Storage, Database etc.)
Scripting & Coding knowledge (PowerShell, Bash, Python)
Experience with Agile tooling and processes (Jira, Kanban, Scrum)
Understanding of migration concepts and migration tooling (Azure Migrate)
Advantages (not essential):
Knowledge of PaaS and SaaS cloud services
Principals and skills related to DevOps
Experience with virtual machine migration
Experience with advocating and implementing Cloud Adoption Frameworks
Database migration experience (Oracle, MS SQL, no SQL)
Containerization knowledge
English language (Fluent)
Senior
* Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest, Debrecen, Szeged, Pécs

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary’s independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, Pécs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
English and German speaking Linux System Administrator (REF1491J)
Tasks:
Installation, administration and patching of many different Linux-servers
Basic SQL knowledge (queries)
Administration and configuration Wildfly, Jboss, Tomcat, Apache, Citrix
Fundamental understanding of Architectures as NAT, Firewalls, Routing
Contact person for all questions regarding Infrastructure, central contact person for the operating departement
Usage of JIRA – issue tracking, administrating
Forwarding the more complex problems to the next level of support
Delivery to the customer, occasionally customer contact
Working office hours without oncall duty
Skills:
At least 2 years experience within supporting Linux systems 
At least 1 year experience with SQL databases
At least 2 years experience in system operation/administration 
English knowledge on C1 level and German knowledge on B2 level
Advantages
Advanced database administration (Oracle and PostgreSQL)
Docker, kubernetes; Administration, Build, OpenShift
Implementation and adaptation of scripts  (mainly Linux Bash; fundamentals of  Windows CMD and Powershell)
Nagios, Administration, implementation of Check-Scripts
ITIL process knowledge
Experienced
* Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest, Debrecen, Pécs, Szeged

Present in the market under the Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions brand name, IT-Services Hungary (ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group and is the largest ICT employer in Hungary. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary’s independent survey and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, Pécs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team. 
LAN Network Engineer (REF1551O)
Beratung von Kunden oder Sales Mitarbeitern zwecks Erarbeitung einer technischen LösungDesign netzwerktechnischer Lösungen inklusive Komponenten- und HerstellerauswahlTests und Proof of Concepts, IntegrationstestsTechnische MigrationsplanungSelbständige Erstellung und Implementierung von NetzwerkkonfigurationenPlanung von komplexen ChangesMitwirkung bei der Umsetzung, Abnahme und Übergabe der LösungErarbeitung von technischen Dokumentationen 
Sehr gute Kenntnisse im Bereich Inhouse Netzwerke LAN + WLANSehr gute Kenntnisse zu Technologien Switching und / oder Wireless, mind. nachgewiesene Qualifikation CCNA oder CCNPErfahrungen im Bereich Netzwerkdesign und NetzwerkplanungGute Kenntnisse zum Herstellerportfolio Cisco und / oder Meraki, alternativ HPE/Aruba bzw. Juniper/MISTErfahrungen im Bereich Netzwerkkonfiguration, Test und AbnahmeSprachkenntnisse: Deutsch Verstehen B2, Sprechen B1, optional Englisch 
Experienced
Intermediate/Advanced German (B2/C1)Scripting capabilities (Python, Javascripts) * Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary’s independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, Pécs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Scrum Master (REF365P)
As "Scrum Master ", you will be responsible for supporting agile teams mainly according to SAFe methodology, organizing and leading agile ceremonies, keep close contact with Product Owner and agile team members, keep project administration up-to-date, using agile tools (JIRA, Confluence, Kanban Board etc) to keep agile teams on track.Your other responsibilities include:Leading the agile team in Servant-leadership style helps to collaborate and interact to maximize the value delivered by the scrum teamGuiding and coaching the agile team and organization on how to use Agile/Scrum practices and valuesSupporting the Product Owner, with special respect to refining and managing the product backlogAssessing the Scrum Maturity of the team and organization and coaching the team to higher levels of maturity, at a pace that is sustainable and comfortable for the team and organizationFacilitating discussion, decision-making, and conflict resolutionRemoving impediments and/or guiding the team to remove impediments
At least 3 years’ experience as Scrum Master in international environmentExperience with different agile project management methodsProject management experienceTechnical and IT know-howAbility to respond to customer needs with a high level of customer focus and social competenceKnowledge of agile administration tools (eg. JIRA, Confluence, miro etc.)Advanced, business-fluent English Advantages:Experience in SAFe methodologyGerman knowledge
Senior
* Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.

Linux System Administrator (REF1610S) (Budapest)

A Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions Magyarország legnagyobb IKT-munkaadója, a Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (korábban IT Services Hungary, ITSH) a Deutsche Telekom Csoport tagja és a németországi székhelyű Deutsche Telekom IT leányvállalata. A 2006-ban alakult, több mint 5000 fős cég az informatikai és telekommunikációs szolgáltatások széles körét nyújtja. A vállalat 2019-ben elnyerte a Nemzeti Befektetési Ügynökség (HIPA) legjobb oktatási együttműködésért járó díját, a PwC Magyarország független felmérése alapján a legvonzóbb magyarországi munkahelyek közé tartozik, és a legetikusabb multinacionális vállalat címét is megkapta. A cég folyamatosan fejleszti négy – budapesti, debreceni, pécsi és szegedi – telephelyét, és várja képzett informatikai szakemberek jelentkezését a csapatába.
Linux System Administrator (REF1610S)
Linux rendszerüzemeltetőként a fő feladatod a német ügyfelünk autó- és teherautógyártó rendszereinek karbantartása lenne. Ez magában foglalja a rendszerek, alkalmazások, illetve folyamatláncok karbantartását és módosítását, valamint a saját fejlesztésű, vagy az ügyfél által szállított alkalmazások telepítését és tesztelését is.
Mi várna rád ebben a pozícióban:
Szoros együttműködés a többi csapattaggal a feladatok végrehajtása érdekében
Az ügyféllel való kapcsolattartás
Harmadik szintű technikai támogatás: alkalmazások és folyamatláncok karbantartása, az infrastruktúrára vonatkozó változtatások végrehajtása az ügyfél követelményeinek megfelelően
A fejlesztői csapat alkalmazásainak telepítése és tesztelése
Hibaelemzés és log file analízis
Unix és Shell szkriptek létrehozása és futtatása
07:00 és 18:00 óra közötti váltott műszakok, napi 8 órás munkaidőben
Elvárások:
Legalább 2 év tapasztalat Linux rendszerekkel
Ismeretek Shell szkriptelésben
Legalább középfokú német nyelvtudás
Apache, Tomcat szoftverek ismerete
Tapasztalat Oracle adatbázissal és SQL lekérdezésekben
Előnyök
Cloud/VM
Alkalmazás szerverek ismerete (Wildfly/Jboss)
Perl script
Angol nyelvtudás
Experienced
* Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.

Budapest, Debrecen, Pécs, Szeged

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary’s independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, Pécs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Azure Cloud Consultant (REF1499H)
About us:As Cloud Migration Services (CMS) part of T-Systems, we are specializing at accompanying our customers on their Cloud adoption journey. Whether it’s a transition from different Cloud or it’s their first time moving from on premises to Cloud, we are there for them to safely guide them through all stages of their transformation because we understand what it takes to become a part of a digital future with innovative solutions.Our mission: Shaping the safest, easiest and most efficient transformation to a digitized and cloud-native future together with our customer.Your Tasks:As Cloud Consultant for Cloud Adoption Services you will be responsible for defining cloud strategies, migration roadmaps and building cloud governance models. You will help our global customers to successfully adopt public cloud to support their strategic goals.Help customers shape their journey of adopting Amazon Web Services, Azure or Google Cloud Platform and provide them with technical and strategic guidance to accelerate their cloud transformation.Lead customer engagements from pre-sales to delivery and act as link between the customer, sales and technical project team.Conduct customer workshops to understand technology and business drivers and present technical concepts. Work with our Product Managers to continuously improve our Cloud Adoption portfolio providing insights on customer projects and market trends. Advise on technology and strategic vision, define cloud adoption and migration strategies and hand-off to architect and migration teams.
Your Profile:We are looking for someone with an entrepreneurial spirit who is keen to make a positive impact for our customers. You are passionate about supporting enterprises to adopt public cloud. In addition, you ideally bring the following with you:A university degree in computer science or a related degree5+ years of relevant work experience with public cloud technologies (AWS, Azure or GCP)A deep technical understanding of public cloud technologies and practical experience in public cloud adoption and migrationExperience with advocating and implementing Cloud Adoption Frameworks on AWS, Azure or GCP and other meaningful best practicesFamiliarity with application discovery tools and cloud migration software is asset but not essentialA can-do attitude which helps you to stand out in a fail fast cultureVery high motivation and the ability to thrive in a dynamic environmentPassion to work in a global and diverse organization and environmentExcellent presentation and communication skills (spoken and written English)
Senior
* Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.

Budapest, Debrecen, Szeged, Pécs

The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary’s independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, Pécs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Azure Cloud Migration Architect (REF1500R)
About us:
As Cloud Migration Services (CMS) part of T-Systems, we are specializing at accompanying our customers on their Cloud adoption journey. Whether it’s a transition from different Cloud or it’s their first time moving from on premises to Cloud, we are there for them to safely guide them through all stages of their transformation because we understand what it takes to become a part of a digital future with innovative solutions.
Our mission: Shaping the safest, easiest and most efficient transformation to a digitized and cloud-native future together with our customer.
 Your Tasks:
As the Cloud Architect for Migration you will be responsible for ensuring the Cloud adoption strategy by defining the cloud adoption roadmap aligned with the target platform solution design, business strategies and the existing landscape environment. You will be responsible for creating the optimal migration journey by leveraging TSI standards as well as cloud native tooling and processes. You will be also contributing to creation and improvement of the migration scenarios, set of best practices and leveraging Zero Touch approach wherever possible.  As Cloud Architect, it will be in your responsibility to manage the engagement with cloud service providers through the build and run phases to ensure that customer achieves maximum value from cloud initiatives and services
Implement complex customer requirements in technical solutions in accordance with best practices, cost-efficiency and future security based on Microsoft Azure
Develop both High-Level and Low-Level design for all possible variations of migration or transformation to hybrid cloud products (private/public) based on Azure
Optimize all onboarding scenarios for customers on private & public cloud together with 3rd party products for migration
Cooperate with the product owner on the continuous development of the T-systems cloud adoption portfolio
Collaborate with sales on preparation of complex customer inquiries and tenders
Be an advisor for local and international customers on optimal cloud adoption strategies on Azure
Collaborate directly with end customers, with T-systems partners and international teams
Your Profile:
We are looking for an individual with strong background in public cloud technologies who is ready to help customers on their migration journey to public cloud. In addition, you ideally bring the following with you:
5+ years of relevant work experience with Azure cloud technologies
A deep technical understanding of public cloud technologies and practical experience in public cloud adoption and migration
Experience with advocating and implementing Cloud Adoption Frameworks on Azure and other meaningful best practices
A can-do attitude which helps you to stand out in a fail fast culture
Passion to work in a global and diverse organization and environment
Excellent presentation and communication skills (spoken and written English)
Familiarity with application discovery tools and cloud migration software is an asset but not essential
Experience with Infrastructure as Code is an asset but not essential
Senior
* Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest, Debrecen, Szeged, Pécs

Process & Quality Manager ARGO - REF1616R (Budapest)
Process & Quality Manager ARGO - REF1616R (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra  ›
Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
német - felsőfokú
Die Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (ehemals IT Services Hungary, ITSH) ist Ungarns größter ICT-Arbeitgeber und ein Mitglied der Deutschen Telekom Gruppe. Das 2006 gegründete Unternehmen mit mehr als 5.000 Mitarbeitern bietet eine breite Palette von IT- und Telekommunikationsdienstleistungen an. Im Jahr 2019 gewann das Unternehmen den Preis der Nationalen Investitionsagentur (HIPA) für die beste Bildungskooperation, wurde laut der unabhängigen Umfrage von PwC Magyarország zu den attraktivsten Arbeitsplätzen in Ungarn gezählt und zum ethischsten multinationalen Unternehmen gewählt. Das Unternehmen baut seine vier Standorte in Budapest, Debrecen, Pécs und Szeged kontinuierlich aus und sucht qualifizierte IT-Fachleute zur Verstärkung seines Teams.
Process & Quality Manager ARGO - REF1616R
Tasks:
Koordination und Moderation von Expertengesprächen in Supersquad SA&DO
Klärung und Strukturierung von Anforderungen aus der Produkt- und Produktionsentwicklung
Abstimmung mit Stakeholdern und SA&DO Feature Squads bei Entwicklungen
Optimierung von Arbeitsabläufe in der agilen Entwicklung
Teilnahme an agilen "Ritualen" (Planning, Refinement, PIP)
Austausch und Zusammenarbeit mit anderen Teams und Bereichen innerhalb der Telekom
Skills:
Sehr gute Deutschkenntnisse (min. C1)
Grundverständnis von IT-Systemen
Fähigkeit, komplexe Sachverhalte zu erfassen, nachvollziehbar zu formulieren und zu dokumentieren
Vertändnis für die Motivation hinter der Automatisierung der Produktion von IP-VPN-Verbindungen
Umfassende Kenntnisse über Leistungsmerkmale, Produktionsprozesse von IP-VPN-Verbindungen
Know-how im Umgang mit IT-Tools zur Modularisierung und Automatisierung der Produktion von IP-basierten Telekommunikationslösungen
Nice to have:
Grundkenntnisse in der agilen Zusammenarbeit
Provisioning Erfahrung
Englisch
Grundverständnis im Bereich Softwareentwicklung
Erfahrung in der Entwicklung und im LifeCycle IP-basierter Telekommunikationsprodukte
Personality
Proaktive Persönlichkeit, offen, neugierig, ausdrucksstark
Selbstmotiviert
Sehr gute Kommunikationsfähigkeit
Teamfähigkeit
Multiple
* Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.

Rendszertervező mérnök (Veszprém) (Veszprém)
Rendszertervező mérnök (Veszprém) (Veszprém)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Thyssenkrupp
Alapvető elvárások
Gyártás, műszaki terület
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség

távmunka, home office
angol - középfokú
A thyssenkrupp több mint 200 év tapasztalatával és a legújabb csúcstechnológiával olyan fejlesztéseken dolgozik, amelyek az autóipar, a logisztika, a gyártechnológia és az acélgyártás területén meghatározó jelentőségűek. A vállalatcsoportunk több mint 106 000 munkavállalóval közel 80 országban van jelen, és évi 42 milliárd eurós forgalmat realizál.
Magyarországi kompetencia központunkban közel 1000 fős mérnökcsapatunkkal innovatív partnerként vagyunk jelen az autóipar egyik leggyorsabban és legizgalmasabban fejlődő szegmensében, az elektromechanikus kormányrendszerek területén. Kiemelkedő minőségű, high-tech fejlesztéseinkkel neves autógyárak igényeit elégítjük ki, fejlesztéseink pedig a világszerte autóba szerelt kormányrendszerek 25 százalékában megtalálhatóak. Mérnökeink olyan ma még nem létező megoldásokon is dolgoznak, amelyek megváltoztathatják az autóipar jövőjét.
Rendszertervező mérnök (Veszprém)
Feladatok
Vevői (OEM) követelmények, specifikációk kezelése
E/E (electric and electronic) rendszertervezés: UML/SysML
Szoftver- és komponensfejlesztés, valamint tesztelés támogatása
Rendszerszintű iteráció és koncepciók kidolgozása
Modellezés, analízisek és szimulációk támogatása
Kapcsolattartás a vevővel és a projekt többi résztvevőjével
Elvárások
Mechatronikai mérnök vagy villamosmérnök végzettség
Nyitottság komplex mechatronikai rendszerek irányába
B kategóriás járművezetői engedély
Kommunikációképes angol nyelvtudás
Személyiség:
Határozottság
Kreativitás
Szisztematikus munkavégzés
Csapatmunkára termettség
Jó kommunikációs és kezdeményező készség
Előny:
SysML/UML (pl. Enterprise Architect) ismerete
Hardveres, szoftveres alaptudás
Járműipari ismeretek
Hasonló munkakörben szerzett tapasztalat
Amit kínálunk
Rugalmas munkaidővel és home office lehetőséggel támogatunk (a legtöbb területen a havi munkaidő 60%-a)
Versenyképes fizetést és széleskörű juttatásokat (cafeteria és bónusz) biztosítunk számodra
Részese lehetsz egy sikeres, gyorsan növekvő technológiai vállalatnak
Új nyelveket tanulhatsz nálunk (5 nyelv közül választhatsz)
Thyssenkrupp Components Technology Hungary Ltd. Daróczi str. 1-3., H-1113 Budapest   |  Phone: +36 (1) 505-9159  |  Fax: +36 (1) 505-9101  |  www.thyssenkrupp.hu

DevOps Engineer (VNI1- EDG_BNG) (REF219H) (Budapest)
DevOps Engineer (VNI1- EDG_BNG) (REF219H) (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
német - középfokú
Present in the market under the Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions brand name, IT-Services Hungary (ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group and is the largest ICT employer in Hungary. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary’s independent survey and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, Pécs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team. 
DevOps Engineer (VNI1- EDG_BNG) (REF219H)
Our group VNI is responsible for the integration, validation and production of test results ("System Under Test") in accordance with the requirements of the Deutsche Telekom AG Platform, as measured by the diversity of the group. The work is carried out in several virtual squads within the group, mainly with german but also international colleagues. In one of these squads, called EDG_BNG, we are looking for an experienced DevOps Engineer colleague. 
The squad EDG_BNG is responsible for engineering, basic testing, product compliance (solution), SSt test (composite test with IT), PV, rollout and the active operation of the BNG. Tasks include:Lifecycle Management (E4X) for the Components and System Software of the BNG, drive further development of the BNG
Tasks: 
Description/Creation/Revision of test cases Automation of test cases Specification of product features environment
Requirements:
Cisco CCNP exam or equivalent knowledge and relevant experience
Strong intermediate knowledge of German
Openness to new network technologies, like BNG
Phython and JavaScript knowhow
Basic knowhow about Test Automation Framework ( TAF)
Accurate and thorough work, inclination to learn, teamwork 
Advantage: 
Knowledge of Cisco CCNP-SP / Juniper JNCIA
English intermediate level
Experience in agile methodology
Experienced
* Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.

Budapest

Feladatok
Beágyazott rendszerek funkcionális és biztonsági automatizált tesztjeinek fejlesztése hardware-in-the-loop környezetben
A szoftvertesztek megtervezése, implementálása pythonban
Tesztek futtatása és kiértékelése
Teszt naplók analízise és a tesztek karbantartása
A tesztelési dokumentáció elkészítése, átvizsgálása és karbantartása
Új szoftvertesztelési technológiák, módszerek és eljárások kidolgozása
Együttműködés a szoftverfejlesztő kollégákkal, csapatokkal
Elvárások
Felsőfokú végzettség mérnöki vagy IT területen
Python programozási tapasztalat
C programozási nyelv ismerete
Középfokú angolnyelv-tudás (szóban, írásban)
Kiváló analitikus és problémamegoldó készség
Csapatjátékos hozzáállás
Előnyök
Beágyazott valósidejű szoftverek fejlesztésében, tesztelésében szerzett gyakorlat
Script nyelvek ismerete (bash, matlab, expect)
Tapasztalat HIL (hardware-in-the-loop) tesztkörnyezetekkel
ISTQB - CTFL bizonyítvány

Azure Cloud Consultant (REF1579Y) (Budapest)
Azure Cloud Consultant (REF1579Y) (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
5+ év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary’s independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, Pécs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
Azure Cloud Consultant (REF1579Y)
About us:
As Cloud Migration Services (CMS) part of T-Systems, we are specializing at accompanying our customers on their Cloud adoption journey. Whether it’s a transition from different Cloud or it’s their first time moving from on premises to Cloud, we are there for them to safely guide them through all stages of their transformation because we understand what it takes to become a part of a digital future with innovative solutions.
Our mission: Shaping the safest, easiest and most efficient transformation to a digitized and cloud-native future together with our customer.
Your Tasks:
As Cloud Consultant for Cloud Adoption Services you will be responsible for defining cloud strategies, migration roadmaps and building cloud governance models. You will help our global customers to successfully adopt public cloud to support their strategic goals.
Help customers shape their journey of adopting Amazon Web Services, Azure or Google Cloud Platform and provide them with technical and strategic guidance to accelerate their cloud transformation.
Lead customer engagements from pre-sales to delivery and act as link between the customer, sales and technical project team.
Conduct customer workshops to understand technology and business drivers and present technical concepts.
 Work with our Product Managers to continuously improve our Cloud Adoption portfolio providing insights on customer projects and market trends.
 Advise on technology and strategic vision, define cloud adoption and migration strategies and hand-off to architect and migration teams.
Your Profile:
We are looking for someone with an entrepreneurial spirit who is keen to make a positive impact for our customers. You are passionate about supporting enterprises to adopt public cloud. In addition, you ideally bring the following with you:
A university degree in computer science or a related degree
5+ years of relevant work experience with public cloud technologies (AWS, Azure or GCP)
A deep technical understanding of public cloud technologies and practical experience in public cloud adoption and migration
Experience with advocating and implementing Cloud Adoption Frameworks on AWS, Azure or GCP and other meaningful best practices
Familiarity with application discovery tools and cloud migration software is asset but not essential
A can-do attitude which helps you to stand out in a fail fast culture
Very high motivation and the ability to thrive in a dynamic environment
Passion to work in a global and diverse organization and environment
Excellent presentation and communication skills (spoken and written English)
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest, Debrecen, Szeged, Pécs
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Neked ajánlott állások
Neked ajánlott állások

Thyssenkrupp -
Control System Engineer (Debrecen)
Randstad Hungary Kft -

International Project Manager - 1584E (Debrecen)
International Project Manager - 1584E (Debrecen)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
középvezető
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
The largest ICT employer in Hungary, Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (formerly IT-Services Hungary, ITSH) is a subsidiary of the Deutsche Telekom Group. Established in 2006, the company provides a wide portfolio of IT and telecommunications services with more than 5000 employees. ITSH was awarded with the Best in Educational Cooperation prize by HIPA in 2019, acknowledged as one of the most attractive workplaces by PwC Hungary’s independent survey in 2021 and rewarded with the title of the Most Ethical Multinational Company in 2019. The company continuously develops its four sites in Budapest, Debrecen, Pécs and Szeged and is looking for skilled IT professionals to join its team.
International Project Manager - 1584E
Tasks
Management of customer and partner projects 
Visualisation and presentation of project results, including customer and management communication 
Execution and optimization of workflows and structures of the international delivery team
Project planning and milestone tracking, Creation of project roadmaps 
The Project Manager is responsible for the projects in terms of budget, time and quality and ensures that the necessary and sufficient actions are taken to win the deal
He/She is responsible for and coordinates the preparation of the proposal for a concrete opportunity until closing and provides quality assurance
The Project Manager is responsible for required board approvals and delivery commitments and manages escalations as appropriate
He/She ensures the content alignment and reconciliation of the different streams
Intensive communication and collaboration with stakeholders e.g. DSM, Sales Consultants, client representatives on all management levels as well as suppliers
Coordinates and accompanies the handover process to transition & transformation team
Project Office Activities for strategic C-Level Projects
Drive Operating Office activities: Prepare and Perform Management Meetings; Task Tracking activities, Setup C-Level Governance structures
Requirements
Min 1,5-2 years relevant work experience as a Project Manager
Excellent in English (speaking and writing skills)
A proactive, intrinsic motivated person with an attitude to embrace change for the better
Strong communication and presentation skills
Ability to multi-task, prioritise, and manage time effectively
Flexibility
A drive to learn new and innovative technologies
German language is an advantage
Munkavégzés helye
Debrecen
Jelentkezem az állásra ›

Full Stack Fejlesztő (REF1279D) (Budapest)
Full Stack Fejlesztő (REF1279D) (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
távmunka, home office
angol - középfokú
A Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (korábban IT Services Hungary, ITSH) Magyarország legnagyobb IKT-munkaadója, a Deutsche Telekom Csoport tagja. A 2006-ban alakult, több mint 5000 fős cég az informatikai és telekommunikációs szolgáltatások széles körét nyújtja. A vállalat 2019-ben elnyerte a Nemzeti Befektetési Ügynökség (HIPA) legjobb oktatási együttműködésért járó díját, a PwC Magyarország független felmérése alapján a legvonzóbb magyarországi munkahelyek közé tartozik, és a legetikusabb multinacionális vállalat címét is megkapta. A cég folyamatosan fejleszti négy – budapesti, debreceni, pécsi és szegedi – telephelyét, és várja képzett informatikai szakemberek jelentkezését a csapatába.
Full Stack Fejlesztő (REF1279D)
Dolgozz Európa vezető telekommunikációs vállalatánál, légy meghatározó tagja fejlesztő csapatunknak, amely vállalatunk jelenlegi és jövőbeli hálózati megoldásait támogató szoftvereit fejleszti.
Feladatok:
SD-WAN fejlesztése Pythonnal
Toolok és interfészek fejlesztése network orchestration topickhoz
Intraneten elérhető API-ok implementálása
Hálózati eszközöket monitorozó és adminisztráló belsős tool fejlesztése
A cég jelenlegi és jövőbeli hálózati megoldásaihoz kapcsolódó szoftverfejlesztésekben való részvétel
Szoros együttműködés a német fejlesztő kollegákkal
Elvárás:
Haladó ismeretek, tapasztalat az alábbiakból:
Python programming
YANG
Docker
Gitlab CI
OpenAPI
Magabiztos angol nyelvtudás
Előnyök:
Netconf/Restconf
Cisco NSO
Tardis (telekom internal API handler)
Német nyelvismeret
Javascript
Vue
Rust
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest, Debrecen, Pécs, Szeged

A Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (korábban IT Services Hungary, ITSH) Magyarország legnagyobb IKT-munkaadója, a Deutsche Telekom Csoport tagja. A 2006-ban alakult, több mint 5000 fős cég az informatikai és telekommunikációs szolgáltatások széles körét nyújtja. A vállalat 2019-ben elnyerte a Nemzeti Befektetési Ügynökség (HIPA) legjobb oktatási együttműködésért járó díját, a PwC Magyarország független felmérése alapján a legvonzóbb magyarországi munkahelyek közé tartozik, és a legetikusabb multinacionális vállalat címét is megkapta. A cég folyamatosan fejleszti négy – budapesti, debreceni, pécsi és szegedi – telephelyét, és várja képzett informatikai szakemberek jelentkezését a csapatába.
Data Engineer - Data Warehousing (SQL/Python)-German Speaking REF1478Z
Feladatok:
Relációs és többdimenziós adatmodellek megtervezésében, modellezésében és felépítésében való közreműködés
Analízisekben, adatstratégiákban, adatvizualizációban és architektúrák tervezésében és felépítésében való közreműködés
A megszerzett ismeretek kollégákkal való megosztása
Elvárások:
Magabiztos B2-es szintű német nyelvtudás
Erős SQL ismeretek
Alapszintű Python, Gitlab és KornShell tudás
Adatvizualizációban, riportolásban és a kapcsolódó szoftverek használatában szerzett tapasztalat
Nyitottság és érdeklődés új ismeretek megszerezésére, fejlődésre való igény
Képesség komplex problémák megértésére és innovatív ötletek kidolgozására
Adekvát és hatékony kommunikáció a vállalat különböző stakeholdereivel
Multiple
* Please be informed that our remote working possibility is only available within Hungary due to European taxation regulation.
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest, Szeged, Debrecen, Pécs
