Junior és Senior beágyazott szoftver fejlesztőmérnök -
Ipari hálózati eszközök - Hibrid munkavégzés
/*Nemzetközi fejlesztőcsapat - Junior és Senior beágyazott szoftverfejlesztés - C, C++, Ethernet - Jó angol*/
Ügyfelünk egy 30 éves cég, amely családi vállalkozásból nőtte ki magát, Németországban alapították, és ma vezető globális szereplő a piacon. A a szenzorgyártás, az automatizálás szakértője. 3600 dolgozója van világszerte. Magyarországon Budapesten és Veszprémben találhatók.
Feladatok:
Ipari hálózati eszközök fejlesztési projektjeiben való részvétel
Beágyazott szoftverek fejlesztése C vagy C++ nyelven
A kifejlesztett szoftverhez ill. hardverhez kapcsolódó tesztek, mérések elvégzése dokumentálása (SIL, HIL)
Nemzetközi fejlesztő csapat tagjaként együttműködés a konstrukció, a minőségbiztosítás és a gyártástechnológia szakembereivel
A kifejlesztett termékek dokumentációinak elkészítése
Munkavégzés helye
Veszprém + heti 2 nap HO

Software Test Engineer (Budapest)
Software Test Engineer (Budapest)
A hirdetés már lejárt!
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Software Test Engineer
The following challenges await the Software Test Engineer:
Designing test scripts and test cases based on given specifications
Conducting functional and user tests
Error analysis, defect tracking and documentation
Taking part in the development and implementaton of new testing methods and principles
Working closely with the software engineer and sales teams
Who is our partner?
Our partner's mission is to provide a tool that makes urban commuting more convenient and contributes to building a sustainable future. Their main product is a mobile application for parking and electric vehicle charging. Furthermore they work closely with big corporations, providing software and hardware related to parking and charging. 
Right now they are looking for their new Software Test Engineer colleague.
The requirements you should fulfill:
Completed technical education in the field of IT or engineering
At least 3-5 years of experience in software testing
Familiarity with SQL
Reliable English knowledge
Soft skills we are looking for:
Analytical thinking
Proactivity, good communication skills
Ability to work well as part of a team
It is a PLUS if you have:
ISTQB
Some programming knowledge (preferably in Java or JavaScript)
Familiarity with some testing tools and methodologies (Postman / SoapUI /Selenium / Appium / JMeter)
Experience with an issue tracking system (Jira / Redmine / Testlink / Spira)
User level familiarity with Linux
What our partner offers you:
Partial home office opportunity
Competitive renumeration package with stock options and education support
Diverse tasks using modern technologies
A friendly team of young professionals
A chance to join a growing project in an emerging industry
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest

Mobilfejlesztő (Budapest)
Mobilfejlesztő (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Középfokú végzettség
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
távmunka, home office
Mobilfejlesztő
Feladatok:
Üzleti és fejlesztői oktatással indítanak, amely megalapozza  karriered
Kliens oldalt képező mobil alkalmazások fejlesztése natív kódban 
2-4 fős csapatok támogatása
Üzleti elvárások megértése, befogadása, megoldások kidolgozása, a kidolgozott megoldás véglegesítése az üzleti elemzővel, architekttel.
Ügyfelünk Magyarország piacvezető humánügyviteli szolgáltatója, több ezer ügyfél használja az ő megoldásait, hiszen ezek az innovatív tudást és korszerű technológiát ötvözik. Sikerük jelentős része a Kutatás és Fejlesztés területhez köthető, náluk születik a jövő, az újdonságokat ők hozzák létre. 
Hozzájuk keresünk most proaktív kollégát a mobilalkalmazás fejlesztő pozíció betöltésére. 
Most Te is csatlakozhatsz hozzájuk, részese lehetsz sikereiknek!  
Az elmúlt évben teljesen új technológiai alapokra helyezték a front- és back end oldalt, annak érdekében, hogy tudásukat, kreativitásukat a folyamatosan változó, kihívásokkal teli üzleti igények megoldására fordíthassák.
Elvárások:
Alkalmazásfejlesztésben szerzett minimum 3 év tapasztalat
iOS esetén erős XCode és Swift, Android esetén erős Android Studio és Kotlin tudás
Tapasztalat iOS és Andriod fejlesztésben is, vagy motiváció a kevésbé ismert platform elsajátítására
Jártasság a következő technológiákban: Alamofire, Crashlytics, Firebase/Core és Messaging
Proaktívitás, önállóság, kreativitás
Előnyt jelent a kód helyes működésének ellenőrzése automata tesztekkel
Ajánlatok:
Szakmai fejlődési lehetőség
Jó hangulat, összetartó csapat
Stabilitás, versenyképes juttatási csomag
Munka és magánélet egyensúlya
Rugalmas munkaidő, home office lehetőség
Családbarát munkahely
Kreatív tevékenységre alkalmas munkakörülmények („A” kategóriás irodaház, nagy személyes tér, zöld erkélyek)
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest

Technical Business Analyst (Magyarország)
Technical Business Analyst (Magyarország)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
5+ év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Technical Business Analyst
Interact with the business in order to know and understand their processes and (IT) needs. Be the
liaison between the business units, technology teams and support teams.
Work directly with stakeholders to gather requirements and provide solutions for applications and
integrations with vendor solutions.
Provide functional support for financial related applications.
Execute or assist in resolution of issues. Ensure appropriate tickets are created to record and
assign issues and document resolution.
Prepare application administration documents, end-user documentation, and/or application
training to end-users.
Utilize change management process to ensure modifications or upgrades are authorized, tested
when applicable, approved, and implemented appropriately.
Act as point of contact with application vendor and customer to coordinate new releases, updates,
or changes.
Ensure proper application monitoring is in place and reviewed. Coordinate with technical staff if
there is an issue.
Understanding security, risk, and compliance controls and work with compliance team and
business owner to ensure controls are met and/or mitigated. Participate in IT audits.
Work within an agile environment.
Participate in initiatives and projects as assigned.
Our partner provides IT infrastructure and application support services to the financial businesses. The Company is responsible for the provision, support and ongoing maintenance of IT operating platforms, applications and services. There is also a strong connection with external providers necessitating vendor and service provider management. Our partner is responsible for driving the technology strategy and providing IT infrastructure solutions that are in alignment with business objectives and the company's technology strategy.
Bachelor’s degree in a related field or equivalent knowledge and a minimum related work
experience of 5 years.
Experience with functional application support preferably in the Financial Services, Banking, and
Insurance industry.
Excellent English communication skills with the ability to work across multi-functional international
teams.
Confident and effective dealing with stakeholders and end users.
Basic understanding of MS Windows Server
Basic understanding of SQL
Basic understanding of MS Internet Information Service (IIS) is preferred.
Experience with cloud concepts
Experience with networking
Experience with (S)FTP Protocol and Processes
Experience with Web Security Certificates
Experience with Service Now, Confluence, Jira preferred
Experience working on projects including requirements gathering, analysis, and documentation.
Good planning, prioritizing and goal setting skills.
High level of knowledge of standard SDLC methodologies.
Advanced ability to accept and embrace change and manage through ambiguous situations.
Understanding of Agile principles and concepts.
Soft Skills
Problem solving skills
Pro-active team player
Creative and the ability to think outside the box
The ability to work independently and also as part of a team
Strong analytical and communication skills
Attention to details
Taking responsibility
Benefits besides compensation/salary:
- Home office
- Flexible working hours
- Health Insurance
- Yoga classes
- Life Fitness discount
- Training & Development opportunities
- Highly people-centric environment

Cloud Data Engineer (Budapest)
Cloud Data Engineer (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Cloud Data Engineer
Tasks
Implement ETL and streaming processes to bring local production and other data to their Cloud Platform using Azure Functions, Azure Data Factory, machine learning and analytic services
Leverage the insights to their data using data analytics tools, image pattern recognition and other data processing functions
Working together in an international team with web application developers, data engineers and DevOps engineers
Our prestigious German client operates as an unique electronic and software developer competence center, specialized in the field of electronic steering systems, they are one of the leading multinational companies in the automotive industry, whose main focus is to create and provide high-tech development solutions to its partners.
Requirements
Education in Computer Science, Mathematics, Information Technology or Information Systems (bachelor, high school or comparable experience)
2+ years experience in one or more object-oriented languages (Javascript, Typescript, Python, Java, etc.)
Experience with git version control, CI/CD Pipelines with GitHub or Azure DevOps
Knowledge and experience about database design
Experience in cloud environments is a plus (Microsoft Azure, AWS, functions as a service, Docker, …)
Fluent English in spoken and written
Personality:
Think and act in the sense of the enterprise, analytical intellectual power
Make decisions in his/her field of activity, be an organizational talent
Efficient, independent and team oriented form of work
Good communication and problem solving skills
Integrated personality and organizational skills
Offer
A modern office in the 11th district is waiting for you to support your creativity with fun community places, cafe rooms, an own cinema and a skybar
You can be part of a successful and growing company in the field of technology
They support you with flexible working hours and home office opportunity (60 % of the working time in many of their positions)
Competitive salary and wide range of other benefits (cafeteria & bonus) are provided to you
You can learn new languages in small groups, selecting from 5 languages
They organize leisure time activities (board games, sport activities)
Munkavégzés helye:
Budapest

Operator 7X24
General purpose of the job 
Operator monitors and controls ICT infrastructure and electronic data processing applications according to standardized operating instructions. 
   Job description Duties & Responsibilities: 
As a main user of the SD manages all tickets and cusomter contacts on the first level (L1)
Receives calls from all levels of the user community and responds in a tactful and courteous manner utilizing proper telephone/email etiquett
Handle user enquiries and support requests to provide a high standard of internal customer satisfaction
Responsible of first level of resolution
Ensures proper assigment to the righ solution groups at L2 operations
Treats and follow all incidents E2E
Monitors all ICT infrastrucure (network, servers, cloud operation, etc) related environments
Monitors of multiple distributed computing SW environment
Ensures proper payment transaction handling by systems
Responsible for system alarm monitoring and daily systems/network routine checking 
Runs batch processes via schedules or on request to produce cusotmer result files and reports
Carry out computer operational tasks according to schedule and established procedures as well as system backup according to the job schedule
Verifies and isolates issues as well as root cause and executes impact analysis if aplicable
Participates in the testing and implementation process (mostly as a tester)
Distributes operation information and reports throughout the responsible organizations according to instruction
Knowledge, Skills and Abilities: 
Basic knowledge on IT and networking infrastrucure and application systems
Knowledge of NOC, SD and Monitoring operation
Understanding of basic principles of e-payments and cards payments technologies
Basic knowledge of SQL scripting and queries creation
problem managment
Undestand SLA concepts
Good in comunication specially in English
Requirements: 
1-3 years experience with NOC/SD operation in the payment processing industry
Experience in payment and card processing industry general
BS degree on IT preferred
Co-operative, good sense of responsibility
Immediate available is an advantage
Shift duty is required
12 hours working period
English - fluent
What you need to do now
If you're interested in this role, click 'apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV, or call us now.
If this job isn't quite right for you but you are looking for a new position, please contact us for a confidential discussion on your career.

Modelling Actuary (Budapest)
Modelling Actuary (Budapest)

Felsőfokú végzettség

angol - középfokú
Modelling Actuary
Szenior aktuárius
Az Ön új cége 
 A biztosító szektor egyik meghatározó szereplője keres aktuáriusi pozícióba kollégát.
Az Ön új pozíciója 
 Ebben a pozícióban a legfőbb feladatok között szerepel a rendszeres riportok, jelentések és adatelemzések készítése, piac és versenytárs elemzések és díjkalkulációs számítások elkészítése, illetve üzleti tervezéshez szükséges aktuáriusi számítások elvégzése.
Mire van szüksége a sikerhez 
 A pozíció betöltéséhez aktuárius, matematikai, informatikai vagy gazdasági végzettség, minimum 2 év tapasztalat és középszintű angol nyelvtudás szükséges. 
Mire számíthat partnerünktől 
 Partnercégünk folyamatos szakmai fejlődési- és remek karrierépítési lehetőségeket és versenyképes fizetést kínál az Ön számára. 
Mit kell tennie most
Amennyiben érdekesnek találta a lehetőséget, kattintson a ‘jelentkezem’ gombra és küldje el nekünk frissített önéletrajzát.
Munkavégzés helye:
Budapest

Data Engineer (Budapest)
Data Engineer (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
távmunka, home office
angol - középfokú
Data Engineer
We are looking for a Data Engineer to join our Client's team. You will use various methods to transform raw data into useful data systems. For example, you’ll create algorithms and conduct statistical analysis. Overall, you’ll strive for efficiency by aligning data systems with business goals.To succeed in this data engineering position, you should have strong analytical skills and the ability to combine data from different sources. Data engineer skills also include familiarity with several programming languages and knowledge of learning machine methods.If you are detail-oriented, with excellent organizational skills and experience in this field, we’d like to hear from you.
About this position
Analyze and organize raw data Build data systems and pipelines
Evaluate business needs and objectives Interpret trends and patterns
Conduct complex data analysis and report on results
Prepare data for prescriptive and predictive modeling
Build algorithms and prototypes
Combine raw information from different sources
Explore ways to enhance data quality and reliability Identify opportunities for data acquisition
Develop analytical tools and programs
Collaborate with data scientists and architects on several projects
Requirements
Previous experience as a data engineer or in a similar role
Thorough knowledge of at least one on-premise or cloud-based database management solution and hands-on experience with batch processing, storing, loading, and transforming structured datasets
Technical expertise with data models, data mining, and segmentation techniques
Experience in using Python for data management
Hands-on experience with SQL database design
Great numerical and analytical skills
Offer
Competitive salary in an innovative company
To be a part of a creative and progressive team
Hybrid-way of working
Continuous learning opportunities
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest

távmunka, home office
Medior/Senior IT PM - Telco/Bank szektor - Vállalkozóknak
/* Nagyvállalati projektek - Hosszútávú lehetőség - Csak vállalkozóknak! */ A magyarországi tanácsadási piac egyik meghatározó, dinamikusan fejlődő stratégiai és üzletviteli tanácsadó cége keres most IT projekt menedzser kollegákat. A cég jelenleg számos szakértőt foglalkoztat, akik jelentős telekommunikációs, energetikai és pénzügyi szektorbeli, valamint gyógyszeripari tapasztalattal rendelkeznek. Két induló projektre keresnek most új kollegát, aki szívesen csatlakozna szakértői csapatukhoz. Feladatok:
Implementációs projektek menedzselése
Projektek, ajánlatok ás költségek adminisztrációja
Ütemezés tervezése, státusz és budget követése, határidők betartása, riportálás a vezetők felé
Kapcsolattartás az üzleti oldali megrendelőkkel, a megrendelők képviselete a fejlesztők és tesztelők felé
Beszállítók és belső erőforrások menedzselése, projektcsapat összefogása
Egyeztetések, workshopok szervezése, moderálása
Elkészült projektanyagok véleményezése, jóváhagyatása
UAT és éles indulás szervezése, kapcsolattartás minden érintettel
Felmerülő problémák kezelése, szakértők koordinálása a megoldási javaslatok kidolgozásában
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest + Home Office

SAP Test Manager
Tasks
Development of automated end-to-end test cases for SAP applications (e. g. S/4HANA) in collaboration with the process experts using the test automation platform Tricentis Tosca
Handling of test data in Tricentis Tosca
Test Execution of the automated test cases
Handling of issues during test execution in collaboration with the process experts
Active contribution to the further development of SAP test automation approach
Support and training for Tricentis Tosca users
Our client is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. With its comprehensive technology portfolio, the company offers integrated solutions for established vehicle manufacturers, mobility providers and start-up companies in the fields of transportation and mobility.
Expectations
University degree in Information Technology/Engineering/Economics
Min. 2 years of relevant experience
Knowledge of SAP ERP
Verbal and written communication and presentation skills
Self-dependence, results orientation, effective time and task management
Very good English knowledge 
Advantages
Multinational environment experience
Tricentis Tosca or comparable test automation tool know-how / experience
Build Server (e.g. jenkins) know-how
Detailed knowledge of one or more SAP module
Offer
Stable company background and long-term working possibility
Full of challenges and high-level professional activities at an international company
Participation in international projects and commission to foreign countries
Career opportunities, continuous training program and language courses
Competitive salary and performance-related bonus
Cafeteria with optional elements
Home office work
School start support

Business Analyst: Finance Systems Support Analyst (Magyarország)
Business Analyst: Finance Systems Support Analyst (Magyarország)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
5+ év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Business Analyst: Finance Systems Support Analyst
Interact with the business (Group Finance) in order to know and understand their processes and (IT) needs. Be the liaison between the business units, technology teams and support teams.
Work directly with stakeholders to gather requirements and provide solutions for finance applications and integrations with vendor solutions.
Provide functional support for financial reporting applications.
Support and develop workflows within Willis Towers Watson Unify automation platform.  
Execute or assist in resolution of issues. Ensure appropriate tickets are created to record and assign issues and document resolution.
Prepare application administration documents, end-user documentation, and/or application training to end-users. 
Utilize change management process to ensure modifications or upgrades are authorized, tested when applicable, approved, and implemented appropriately.
Act as point of contact with application vendor and customer to coordinate new releases, updates, or changes.
Ensure proper application monitoring is in place and reviewed. Coordinate with technical staff if there is an issue.
Understanding risk and compliance controls and work with compliance team to ensure controls are met and/or mitigated.
Work within an agile environment.
Participate in initiatives and projects as assigned.
Aegon is a multinational financial services group headquartered in The Hague, the Netherlands. The company has multiple locations across the globe, with core markets in The Netherlands, the UK, and the US, growth markets in China, Brazil, and Iberia, and an Asset Management organization with locations in the UK, US, NL, and Hungary. Aegon Global Business Solution Center is supporting these businesses with IT, Finance, Risk, Model Validation, Actuarial, Audit, and Asset management services with a growing team of approx. 300 people, based in Budapest, Hungary.
At Aegon, they foster a diverse workforce and an inclusive culture. They are a people business, and they recognize that delivering excellent client outcomes comes from harnessing distinct perspectives. They value diversity in the full range of human uniqueness without limitation, including race, gender, ability, language, culture, beliefs, age, origin, background, perspectives, and experiences.
Requirements
Bachelor’s degree in a related field (Accounting, Finance) or equivalent knowledge and a minimum related work experience of 5-7 years. 
Knowledge of Solvency II and International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS) reporting and consolidation is an advantage.
Experience within functional support in the area of financial reporting and consolidation applications preferably in the Financial Services and Insurance industry.
Excellent English communication skills with the ability to work across multi-functional international teams. 
Confident and effective dealing with stakeholders and end users.
Understanding of programming languages (SQL, MDX) and CCH Tagetik is an advantage.
Experience with workflow automation tools (Willis Towers Watson Unify) is an advantage.  
Proficiency with Microsoft Office Excel and Word.
Well-developed skills in root cause analysis.
High level of knowledge of standard SDLC methodologies.
Advanced ability to accept and embrace change and manage through ambiguous situations.
Understanding of Agile principles and concepts.
Knowledge of internal control frameworks.
Soft Skills
Problem solving skills
Pro-active
Creative and the ability to think outside the box
The ability to work independently and also as part of a team 
Strong analytical and communication skills 
Attention to details
Taking responsibility
Competitive salary
Comprehensive health package
 Brand new office at an excellent location
 Hybrid working
Opportunities for growth and advancement
 A highly people centric, positive and supportive work environment

Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások

3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
Tapasztalt C++ fejlesztő - Svéd multinacionális cég
/* Aktív angol nyelvhasználat - Svéd vállalati kultúra - Stabilitás - Heti 1 nap bejárás */ Parnerünk egy svéd hátterű, multinacionális vállalat, komplex mérnöki megoldások egyik vezető globális szállítója. A vállalat 20 éve van jelen Magyarországon, fő tevékenységi köre a szoftverfejlesztés és -tesztelés, az információtervezés és -menedzsment, valamint beágyazott rendszerek fejlesztése. 220 fős budapesti csapatukba keresünk most tapasztalt C++ fejlesztő kollegát. Feladatok:
Hálózati eszközök fejlesztése, C++ Linux környezetben
Cross-functional team munkájában való aktív részvétel
Új funkciók fejlesztése, meglévő funkciók továbbfejlesztése
Tesztelésben, hibakeresésben és hibajavításban való részvétel
Később a szenioritás függvényében tech lead és mentori feladatok
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest, 9. kerület + Home Office

/* Angliai ügyfél - Teljes távmunka - Modern technológiák - Nagyvolumenű rendszerek */ Nemzetközi csapatba keresünk fullstack vagy backend .NET vezető fejlesztő kollegát újbudai szoftverfejlesztő partnerünkhöz. Ha szívesen dolgoznál egy komplex, prémium e-kereskedelmi alkalmazás fejlesztésén, egy jól szervezett csapatban, akkor náluk a helyed! Csatlakozz most bővülő, dinamikus csapatukhoz. Vezető fejlesztői szerepkör egy API integrációkban erős, microservices architektúrájú rendszer fejlesztésében

Proof of Concept készítési feladatok
Aktív részvétel a code review folyamatokban, a fiatalabb kollegák számára a példamutatásban
Technikai segítségnyújtás és javaslattétel az üzleti elemző kollegák számára

Senior Java full-stack fejlesztő - Hitelfelvételi projekt - Belváros - Nagyrészt remote!
/* Full-stack - Java Spring - Dinamikus csapat - Fejlődési lehetőség */ Ügyfelünk banki digitális csatornák fejlesztése mellett innovatív fintech megoldások fejlesztésével foglalkozik.
Ha szívesen lennél tagja fejlesztő csapatuknak és szeretnél innovatív projekteken dolgozni, akkor jelentkezz!

Üzleti igények felmérése, egyeztetés az üzleti szereplőkkel

Junior .NET developer (Magyarország)
Junior .NET developer (Magyarország)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Junior .NET developer
JUNIOR .NET DEVELOPER
Pozíció leírása / Job descriptionWhat you will do in the first three months:
Follow an individual development plan with your supervisor and improve your skills based on that
Participate in writing the application’s business logic and covering it with tests
Expand the rich user interface and offer ideas for improving it
Develop data schemas and integrate with third-party services
Optimize heavily loaded parts of the application and deal with security vulnerabilities
Become a member of a team of professionals to achieve quality results efficiently.
Elvárások / Requirements
Requirements you should fulfill:
0-1 year of work experience in the IT sphere
Excellent knowledge of OOP and the basics of the .NET platform (.Net Framework and.Net Core)
Confident knowledge of the C# syntax
Experience with .NET Core, ASP.NET Core, CSS, HTML, JavaScript
Good knowledge of SQL and MS SQL database, ability to use EntityFramework effectively
Good technical English (conversational, written)
It is a huge PLUS if you have experience with the following:
WCF, WPF
Angular, React
Unit testing (TDD, BDD)
Amit kínálunk / Offer
What can our Partner offer?
Stable long-term work environment
Competitive salary with a flexible system of revisions
Benefits and social packages
Comfortable A+ office in Budapest
Every necessary tool and device in the office will be provided for you to be able to comfortably perform all project tasks: computers, meeting rooms, spacious modern kitchens with professional coffee machines, comfortable recreation areas with game consoles, board games, and a selection of literature for every taste
Paid English courses and conversation clubs
Opportunities for professional and personal growth
Mentoring program, internal and external professional training programs
Support and care from our client's friendly team
Munkavégzés helye
Magyarország

Devops Engineer (Budapest)
Devops Engineer (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Devops Engineer
Tasks:
Your responsibilities will be: 
Deploying and configuring microservices applications on AWS;
CI/CD process development and support;
Support and administration of infrastructures on AWS;
Active participation in automating processes, and implementing new systems;
Making sure the systems are available, well-optimized and well-maintained to meet clients’ expectations;
Keeping contacts and coordinating with various departments
Our partner is a global supplier of software engineering and IT outsourcing services, and they are looking for a Junior PHP Developer. You’ll be part of a team of professionals who are ready to find the best tailor-made IT solutions for their multinational clients in various industries and solve complex problems.
Expectations:
Experience in administering Linux/UNIX and Windows systems (must be practical, at least two years);
Experience with web servers and deployment of web applications;
Experience with AWS cloud systems;
Experience with Docker and Kubernetes;
Experience with MongoDB, MySQL;
Practical CI/CD automation and organization skills (Jenkins, CodeBuild, CodeDeploy, CodePipeline);
Knowledge of bash/shell;
Ansible automation experience is desirable;
Knowledge of Python is desirable;
Knowledge of English at the intermediate level is required 
Offer:
Stable long-term work environment;
Competitive salary with a flexible system of revisions;
Benefits and social packages;
Comfortable A+ office in Budapest;
Every necessary tool and device in the office will be provided to comfortably perform all project tasks: computers, meeting rooms, spacious modern kitchens with professional coffee machines, comfortable recreation areas with game consoles, board games, and a selection of literature for every taste;
Paid English courses and conversation clubs;
Opportunities for professional and personal growth;
Mentoring program, internal and external professional training programs;
Support and care from our client's friendly team
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest

Szenior IT Business Analyst - E-kereskedelmi platform
/* Angliai ügyfél - Home Office lehetőség - Modern technológiák - Nagyvolumenű rendszerek */ Nemzetközi csapatba keresünk tapasztalt IT Business Analyst kollegát API projekt tapasztalattal és erős angol nyelvtudással. A 2016-ban alakult újbudai szoftverfejlesztő partnerünk különböző multinacionális cégek fejlesztési projektjeihez nyújt segítséget. A budapesti csapat a mindennapokban szorosan együttműködik angliai kollegákkal. A projekt egy prémium, többmillió felhasználós e-kereskedelmi platform és a hozzá kapcsolódó 3rd party interfészek fejlesztése. Feladatok:
Kommunikációs kapocs az üzlet, és a termékfejlesztési, technikai csapatok között
A feature fejlesztések során a storyk bemutatása, a folyamatok vizuális reprezentálása a csapat számára
A funkció vertikális és horizontális szeletelése
Az API interfészek, különböző belső és külső alkalmazások közötti kapcsolódási pontok tisztázása, specifikációk írása
Szükség esetén adatszerzés, adatelemzés
Termékfelelősi feladatok ellátása
Funkcionális követelmények elemzése, finomítása, JIRA-ban való feldolgozása
Pre-grooming, post-grooming
Kért változtatások elemzése, finomítása, story frissítése
Külső kliens interfészeken az élésbe állás támogatása
Együttműködés a QA-val és a termékfejlesztéssel
Felmerülő kérdések megválaszolása
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest, 11. kerület + HO

API Developer (Magyarország)
API Developer (Magyarország)
A hirdetés már lejárt!
Hays Hungary Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - felsőfokú
API Developer
Your new company 
Would you like to boost your career in an international environment as an API Developer?
Our partner company uses innovation and technology to deliver energy to our world and they are looking for an API developer to join to their 2 people team in Budapest and other colleagues globally.
Your new role 
API developers have the responsibility to gather and understand the user's requirements and based on those requirements design, craft and unit test an API solution ensuring that it's low in technical debt and designed and coded with cyber security in mind.
API solutions should expose endpoints that can be managed and consumed by front-end applications, other API, cloud resources
API developers are also responsible for managing the source code of the solution they create.
API developers are required to deliver reliable, secure, and efficient APIs, that are intuitive and easy to use by other developers.
API Developers are required to adhere DevOps practice, clean code, and compile with all XOM API security best practice
What you'll need to succeed 
API/Integration (2+ years of experience)
Continuous Integration and Delivery (2+ years of experience)
Backend development, experience wit Java and/or C#
Crafting Code / Technical Application Programming: C# language
Database Design & Programming
Secure Software Implementation / Coding
Software Testing
DevOps practice
Fluent English
What you need to do now
If you're interested in this role, click 'apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV, or call us now.
If this job isn't quite right for you but you are looking for a new position, please contact us for a confidential discussion on your career.

Frontend Developer (React) (Budapest)
Frontend Developer (React) (Budapest)

EasyHiring Services Kft.

beosztott

angol - felsőfokú
Frontend Developer (React)
Tasks:
Developing and maintaining front-end components by applying technologies – we are focusing on React
Working in Agile environment and try yourself in end-to-end testing and development
Having code ownership and quality awareness
Code review and testing
Keeping contact with partners, customers
Our partners’ dynamically growing Frontend Developer Team is looking for new member!
You will be liable for service-based front-end development and will have the possibility to get acquainted with the airline business domains (In-flight Entertainment and other innovated solutions). So join them and work on the development of B2B and B2C web applications!
Requirements:
Have at least 3 years experiences in desktop/ web development and have deep knowledge of JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, React
Have good understanding of agile software development processes
Are passionate to be up-to-date in new JS technologies
Are able to communicate in English both spoken and written
Have willingness to learn and take responsibility for your work and projects
Have good cooperative and communication skills
Experience in software development projects in cooperation with different development teams is also an advantage
Offers:
Gross 640 000 HUF cafetéria
Flexible working hours based on core time
Designed career paths (and a career management system)
Training courses
After six months you will receive discounts for flights
1 office day/week
Munkavégzés helye:
Budapest

Frontend Developer
In your daily work, you will
develop effective solutions for complex business problems in various industries
integrate new components and technologies into existing software systems and architectures
you will design responsive front end applications
participate in important project milestones; like estimation, releases, elaboration, etc.
maintain and improve code quality (especially through code reviews)
give and receive constructive feedback
Our partner company is a leading Swiss software engineering firm specializing in the design, implementation and integration of large-scale business and security software solutions. Renowned Swiss and German customers from various industries and the public sector rely on their services and products. Their development center in Budapest is continuously growing so they are looking for new experts for our ongoing and brand new projects.
Requirements
confident knowledge of front-end development (Javascript, React / Angular)
good communication skills in English (spoken and written)
a university degree (MSc/BSc)
Nice to have
familiarity with relational databases
experience in working in distributed teams
Confident knowledge of OOP (Java is a plus)
Continuous personal development and learning:
diverse, challenging tasks, a large variety of projects, both in terms of industry and technology edicated managerial support, helpful colleagues, supportive work culture career path:
further develop your skills in your areas of expertise, or try yourself out in other parallel fields: project or people management, learning new technologies
internal and external education, online and offline trainings (technical, soft skill, leadership), conferences
Great team spirit:
amazing social environment with friendly, smart and helpful colleagues
company sponsored events (project and company dinners, parties, long weekend in summer)
international atmosphere, collaboration with colleagues in Switzerland and Portugal
Flexible working hours
People care:
state-of-the-art workspace (small offices, height adjustable desks)
fresh fruit daily in the office, free coffee
breakout area with csocsó, xbox, fishpong
private health insurance from Medicover
on-site massage therapist
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest

Senior Software Engineer (Budapest)
Senior Software Engineer (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Senior Software Engineer
In your daily work, you will:
design and implement effective solutions for complex business problems in various industries
solve complex and mysterious bugs and integration problems
transfer your know how to new architectures and technologies
work on all layers of the software stack (web and mobile UI, business layer, database)
mentor and support your teammates
participate in important project milestones; like estimation, releases, elaboration, etc.
maintain and improve code quality (especially through code reviews)
give and receive constructive feedback
Our partner company is a leading Swiss software engineering firm specializing in the design, implementation and integration of large-scale business and security software solutions. Renowned Swiss and German customers from various industries and the public sector rely on their services and products. Their development center in Budapest is continuously growing so they are looking for new experts for our ongoing and brand new projects.
Must have:
in-depth knowledge of object oriented programming (Java is a plus) and/or
in-depth knowledge of front-end (Javascript, Angular, React) or mobile development
solid understanding of the software development lifecycle and agile methodologies
ability to collaborate seamlessly and effectively with team members and potentially with the client
good communication skills in English (spoken and written)
a university degree (MSc/BSc)
Nice to have:
familiarity with relational databases
experience in working in distributed teams
Continuous personal development and learning:
diverse, challenging tasks, a large variety of projects, both in terms of industry and technology
dedicated managerial support, helpful colleagues, supportive work culture
career path: further develop your skills in your areas of expertise, or try yourself out in other parallel fields: project or people management, learning new technologies
internal and external education, online and offline trainings (technical, soft skill, leadership), conferences
Great team spirit:
amazing social environment with friendly, smart and helpful colleagues
company sponsored events (project and company dinners, parties, long weekend in summer)
international atmosphere, collaboration with colleagues in Switzerland and Portugal
Flexible working hours
People care:
state-of-the-art workspace (small offices, height adjustable desks)
fresh fruit daily in the office, free coffee
breakout area with csocsó, xbox, fishpong
private health insurance from Medicover
on-site massage therapist
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest

Datadog Analyst (Budapest)
Datadog Analyst (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Hays Hungary Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Datadog Analyst
Your new company 
Would you like to boost your career in an international environment as a Datadog Analyst?
Our partner company uses innovation and technology to deliver energy to our world and they are looking for a Datadog Analyst to join to their 9 people team in Budapest and other colleagues globally. You will work both on projects as well base support enhancements by providing consultation and design services in response to requests.
Your new role 
You should learn/understand the capabilities of the monitoring tools and gather the monitoring needs of customers
Cooperate with developer and architects to design new and modify existing components of monitoring applications
Coordinate with other engineers to evolve, employ, and enforce our architecture standards and guidelines
Provide functional analysis
Learn and apply new strategies and industry practices in IT monitoring
You will work in an Agile team
What you'll need to succeed:
3+ years of experience in the below skillsets
Datadog Consulting expert level
Fluent English knowledge in written and verbal
Desired Technical Skills:
Analytics
Communication Protocols
Domain Name Service (DNS) and name resolution of client computers
General Database
General Logic Diagrams
Infrastructure automation
Application Programming is nice to have
What you need to do now
If you're interested in this role, click 'apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV, or call us now.
If this job isn't quite right for you but you are looking for a new position, please contact us for a confidential discussion on your career.

Medior Java full-stack fejlesztő - Spring, Angular - Banki terület - Szinte Remote!
/* Java, Spring, Angular - Szakmai fejlődés - Banki terület - Hitelfelvételi projekt */ Partnerünk banki digitális csatornák fejlesztésében végez úttörő szerepet és teremt modernebb, felhasználóbarátabb folyamatot ügyfeleik számára.
Légy részese fejlesztői csapatuknak, mely vállalati partnereik problémáit innovatív, digitális megoldásokkal kivitelezi!
Feladatok:
Webes alkalmazások backend és front-end programozása
Dokumentációs feladatok elvégzése
Kapcsolattartás a belső és külső ügyfelekkel, informatikai szolgáltatókkal és egyéb alvállalkozókkal
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest, 8. ker + 4 nap HO/hét

iOS Developer
In your daily work you will:
create a new app from scratch
design, develop, maintain features that meets high quality standards
provide unit tests to verify your implementation
maintain and improve code quality (especially through code reviews)
investigate, analyze, and fix incidents and performance issues from production
collaborate with the customer and project leadership in Switzerland
create demos and present to clients
give and receive constructive feedback 
work in a hybrid working model
Our partner company is a leading Swiss software engineering firm specializing in the design, implementation and integration of large-scale business and security software solutions. Renowned Swiss and German customers from various industries and the public sector rely on their services and products. Their development center in Budapest is continuously growing so they are looking for new experts for our ongoing and brand new projects.
5+ years of iOS development experience
a solid knowledge of iOS native frameworks, tools, and development techniques like (Swift 5, ReSwift, RxSwift, Alamofire, Firebase, Socket.IO)
knowledge of SwiftUI design principles, patterns, and best practices is a plus
familiarity with RESTful APIs
excellent communication skills in English (spoken and written)
a university degree (MSc/BSc)
Nice to have
experience in working in distributed teams
Continuous personal development and learning:diverse, challenging tasks, a large variety of projects, both in terms of industry and technologydedicated managerial support, helpful colleagues, supportive work culturecareer path: further develop your skills in your areas of expertise, or try yourself out in other parallel fields: project or people management, learning new technologiesinternal and external education, online and offline trainings (technical, soft skill, leadership), conferences
Great team spirit:amazing social environment with friendly, smart and helpful colleaguescompany sponsored events (project and company dinners, parties, long weekend in summer)international atmosphere, collaboration with colleagues in Switzerland and Portugal
Flexible working hours
People care:state-of-the-art workspace (small offices, height adjustable desks)fresh fruit daily in the office, free coffeebreakout area with csocsó, xbox, fishpongprivate health insurance from Medicoveron-site massage therapist

Kérjük, aktiváld a felhasználói fiókodat: A megadott e-mail címre elküldtük a megerősítő linket.
Ezt követően feltöltheted az önéletrajzodat és beállíthatod, hogy milyen állásokról szeretnél értesítést kapni.
Sikeres álláskeresést kívánunk!
Sikeres regisztráció!
Köszönjük, hogy regisztráltál! Még aktiválnod kell a kiküldött e-mail-ben szereplő linkre kattintva! 
A nyereménysorsolásban csak aktivált fiókkal veszel részt. (Ha a beérkező levelek között nem találod, nézd meg a „Levélszemét” mappát is.)
Sikeres álláskeresést kívánunk!
Sikeres aktiválás!
Köszönjük, hogy aktiváltad Jobline fiókodat és Álláspostádat! Részt veszel a nyereménysorsolásban.
Töltsd fel önéletrajzodat a Jobline-ra, hogy MOBILON is jelentkezhess állásainkra, és hogy a munkaadók megtalálhassanak neked való állásajánlatokkal!
Sikeres álláskeresést kívánunk!
Új Állásposta beállítva!
Köszönjük, hogy új Álláspostát állítottál be, ezzel részt veszel a nyereménysorsoláson. A nyerteseket e-mailben értesítjük. 
Töltsd fel önéletrajzodat a Jobline-ra, hogy MOBILON is jelentkezhess állásainkra, és hogy a munkaadók megtalálhassanak neked való állásajánlatokkal!
Sikeres álláskeresést kívánunk!

Sikeres álláskeresést kívánunk!

.NET backend fejlesztő - Légitársasági projekt (Magyarország)

Felsőfokú végzettség

távmunka, home office
angol - középfokú
.NET backend fejlesztő - Légitársasági projekt
/* Nagyvállalati ügyfelek - Microsoft technológiák - 15 év tapasztalat - Stabil háttér */ Microsoft technológiákkal foglalkozó partnercégünk keres szenior .NET backend fejlesztő kollegát, 20 fős csapatába. A cég az informatika széles spektrumán kínál megoldásokat ügyfeleinek, magába foglalva többek között az egyedi alkalmazásfejlesztést, a Microsoft termékek bevezetését és az ügyfeleknek nyújtott tanácsadást. Az elmúlt 15 év alatt több mint 20 Microsoft Magyarországgal közös projektjük volt, de dolgoztak már nagy nemzetközi projektben is Belgiumban és Dubajban.
Légitársasági projektjükre keresünk most új kollegát.
Főbb feladatok:
Rendszerintegrációs feladatok (soap vagy rest web service, adatbázis, file, stb...)
Üzleti háttérfolyamatok automatizálása, támogatása
Specifikáció pontosítása, megvalósítás becslése, megoldás megtervezése
Fejlesztés megvalósítása, és tesztelés
Kulcs kompetenciák
Műszaki, informatikai területen szerzett diploma
Legalább 3 év .NET fejlesztői tapasztalat
Erős SQL tudás, Microsoft SQL Server ismeretek
Előnyt jelent
További Microsoft platform termékek ismerete (pl. BizTalk)
Szükséges készségek:
Jó kommunikációs készség
Önállóság
Hatékony munkavégzés önállóan és csapatban
Szükséges nyelvtudás
Középfokú angol nyelvtudás
Heti óraszám 40
Munkavégzés helye
Home Office
Amit a megbízónk kínál
Hosszútávú munkalehetőség
Kiváló munkakörnyezet
Előrelépési lehetőség
Változatos projektek
Szükséges dokumentumok
Szakmai önéletrajz
Munkavégzés helye
Home Office

teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Senior fullstack fejlesztő - Nagyvolumenű rendszerek
/* Aktív angolhasználat - Komplex zöldmezős projekt - Teljes távmunka - Modern technológiák */ 2016-ban alakult újbudai szoftverfejlesztő ügyfelünk különböző multinacionális cégek fejlesztési projektjeihez nyújt segítséget. A budapesti csapat a mindennapokban szorosan együttműködik angliai kollegákkal. Ha szívesen vennél részt egy új zöldmezős projekt backend és frontendjének fejlesztésében, akkor jelentkezz! Vállalkozók jelentkezését is várjuk! Feladatok:
Fullstack fejlesztői feladatok zöldmezős projekten, API-integrációs fókusszal
Backend hangsúlyos feladatkör - 70% backend és 30% frontend feladat
Tesztvezérelt fejlesztés (TDD)
Proof-of-Concept készítési feladatok
Szoros együttműködés a csapattársakkal, és más senior fejlesztőkkel a termékfejlesztési célok elérésében
Szoros együttműködés a terméktervezéssel, és a termékmenedzsment csapattal a funkcionális követelményekben
Agilis csapatban folytatott munka
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest, 11. kerület
Jelentkezem az állásra ›

Neked ajánlott állások

Vezető tesztmérnök (Tiszaújváros)
Vezető tesztmérnök (Tiszaújváros)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
Gyártás, műszaki terület
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
középvezető
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Vezető tesztmérnök
Feladatok:
Különböző programok, tesztmódszerek megválasztása, fejlesztése, folyamatok, szoftverek összeállítása,
Az eredmények hatáselemzése, javaslattétel technológiai / funkcionális / méréstechnikai fejlesztésekre, azok megvitatása a termék fejlesztéséért felelős és abban közreműködő társosztályokkal,
Folyamatos kapcsolattartás a vevővel,
Funkcionális és operatív terület stratégiájának támogatása,
A teszt kapacitás felügyelete, a vevői igényekhez való igazítása,
Új üzletek megszerzésében és bevezetésében való aktív részvétel.
Elvárások:
Villamosmérnök, Mechatronikai mérnök vagy Mérnök-informatikus végzettség,
Elektronikai területen/gyártásban szerzett legalább 5 éves tapasztalat,
Számítástechnikai hardver és szoftver ismeretek,
Minimum 1 éves vezetői pozícióban eltöltött tapasztalat,
Méréstechnikai ismeretek,
Tárgyalóképes angol nyelvtudás.
Amit kínálunk:
Szakmai és személyes továbbfejlődés,
Nyelvi és szakmai képzések,
Nemzetközi munkakörnyezet,
Teljesítményt elismerő és támogató vállalati kultúra,
Versenyképes juttatási csomag
Cafetéria (25.000 Ft),
Bejárás támogatása (autónál 15ft/km; tömegközlekedésnél 100%),
Negyedéves bónusz
Hűségbónusz
Szolgáltatási csomag (éttermekbe, edzőterembe kedvezmény, MacroKlinikába kedvezmény, stb.).

Tiszaújváros

Linux rendszermérnök (Budapest)
Linux rendszermérnök (Budapest)
A hirdetés már lejárt!
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Középfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
Linux rendszermérnök
Magyar alapítású, immár 150 főre növekedett partnercégünk egyedi szoftverek fejlesztésével foglalkozik, amelyeket ügyfeleik az oktatásban, közlekedésben, a banki-biztosító szektorban, de a telekommunikációs iparágban is használnak. Digitális megoldásaik mellett vállalkozásfejlesztéssel és üzletfejlesztési tanácsadással is foglalkoznak. Leendő kollégáikat belvárosi iroda, változatos projektek és az egyedi fejlődést kiemelten támogató agilis környezet várja.Jelenleg a 3 fős üzemeltetési csapatukba keresünk Linux környezetben tapasztalt rendszermérnök kollégát, akinek legfontosabb feladata a fejlesztői csapatok DevOps jellegű támogatása, illetve a saját fejlesztésű termékek mögötti infrastruktúra üzemeltetése lesz.
A pozícióról
meglévő, komplex rendszerek üzemeltetése Linux (Debian) környezetben üzleti igényeknek megfelelően
új rendszerek tervezése és kialakítása szorosan együttműködve a fejlesztőkkel (projektfüggően PHP, Java, Ruby vagy Python vonalon)
fejlesztői csapatok DevOps jellegű támogatása
AWS menedzsment
Elvárások
legalább 3 év rendszerüzemeltetési tapasztalat Linux környezetben
gyakorlati tudás verziókövető rendszerekkel és backup monitoring megoldásokkal
hálózati tapasztalatok Shell scripting képesség önálló döntések meghozására és szakmai felelősségvállalásra
Előny:
DevOps tapasztalat,
konténertechnológiák ismerete (Chef, Docker, Kubernetes) Cloud - legideálisabb esetben AWS - ismeretek
agilis környezetben szerzett tapasztalat
Amit Megbízónk kínál
felelősségteljes és önállóságot igénylő munkakör változatos projektekkel
egyéni szakmai fejlődési terv,
karriermenedzsment: belső és külső szakmai képzések, tanfolyamok támogatása teljes körű egészségbiztosítási csomag,
akár családtagoknak is angol nyelvtanulási lehetőség
belvárosi iroda tetőterasszal
befogadó és jó hangulatú csapat
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest
Neked ajánlott állások
Neked ajánlott állások

Senior PLM / ALM Application Engineer
Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions -

Randstad Hungary Kft -

Derivatives Operations Analyst (Budapest)
Derivatives Operations Analyst (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Hays Hungary Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
Pénzügy, számvitel
IT, telekommunikáció

3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Derivatives Operations Analyst
Your new company
Our partner is a significant player in the investment and asset management sector. The company is actively growing and hiring new team members.
Your new role
You will proceed with collateral management, transaction processing, regulatory reporting, payment processing processes within the derivatives department. Also, you will set up and maintain tools in Excel which help to automate and control processes. The building up and maintaining the productive communication with the key stakeholders is an important part of the success. 
What you'll need to succeed
To be considered for the role you need to have a degree in Finance, Economics or Accounting. At least 2+ years of relevant experience with collateral management and OTC Derivatives. Hands-on approach, result-driven mindset. Also, you must be able to communicate in English (advanced).
What you'll get in return
Almost fully remote/hybrid working model. Competitive salary and benefit package, career development opportunities.
What you need to do now
If you're interested in this role, click 'apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV, or call us now.
If this job isn't quite right for you but you are looking for a new position, please contact us for a confidential discussion on your career.

Szenior C# fejlesztő - High-tech személyazonosítás
/* Érdekes, izgalmas projektek - Kiváló munkakörülmények - Stabil, hosszútávú lehetőség - Teljes távmunka */ A 2009-ben alakult cég egyedi high-tech személyazonosító megoldás fejlesztésén dolgozik. Ez a hazai vállalkozású, innovatív cég a kormányzati és versenyszférának egyaránt fejleszt. Szenior kollegákat keresnek most új csapatukba. Főbb feladatok:
Meglévő Windows alkalmazások továbbfejlesztése és modernizálása (részleges/teljes refaktorizálás)
Ügyfelek rendszereihez történő integrációk előkészítése, megvalósítása
Részvétel új fejlesztési módszertanok kialakításában
Specifikációk, tervezési feladatok megvalósítása
Új technológiák kutatása, kiválasztása
Automata tesztek fejlesztése
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest, 11. kerület

C++ Developer
Our global Client is looking for their new Java Developer colleague who can take part in designing common modules for various products which provide optimal support for airlines! 
By joining one of their teams you will have a possibility to use a wide range of Java technologies and to work together with German and Hungarian teams.
Elvárások / Requirements
You will be successful if you have
Practical experience in design and development in C++  (at least 3 years)
Interpretation and clarification of new/updated functional and non-functional requirements
Good Object Oriented Programming and Design skills
Passionate about complex, business critical systems
Solution-focused approach
Good knowledge of English both spoken and written
passionate about complex, business critical systems
You are looking for us, if You have
3+ years experience in C++ programming
Proficiency in usage of version controlling systems (Git)
Analytical, solution oriented attitude
Amit kínálunk / Offer
You will be responsible for:
Designing, implementing and testing new functionalities
Maintain the current system
Keeping contact and cooperating with teams located in Hungary and in Germany, ensure smooth and active communication with co-workers and associated partners

Java Developer
Wien (2-3 on-site / week)
26-32 EUR / hour contractor rate
| Java backend software development for Austrian insurance company
Your new company
A remarkable Austrian insurance company is seeking a new contractor for Java backend developer position with paid travel to Wien for two days every week or for three days every second week.
Your new role
Developing backend IT solutions for insurance company, reporting and documentation in German language with some tasks related to cloud platform, databases and microservices.
Tech stack
Java, JEE, Spring, SpringBoot, Eclipse, Maven, Jenkins, Junit, IntelliJ, Git, Jira, Confluence, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, SQL, CI/CD, Microservices
What you'll need to succeed
Strong Java / JEE / Spring / SpringBoot skills
JSF
Fluent German language skills
Eclipse / Maven / Jenkins / JUnit / IntellIJ
Git / Jira / Confluence
Docker / Kubernetes / AWS
MySQL / PostgreSQL / PL/SQL / MongoDB / Oracle DB
CICD / Microservices
5 years of relevant work experience in Java / Angular development
Advantages
JPA / JBoss / XML / UML
Javascript / Typescript / Angular / HTML / CSS
REST / SOAP
Ant
Kafka Tools
Python
Contact us to get more details!

Sales support engineer (Budapest)
Sales support engineer (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Hire-One Személyzeti Tanácsadó Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
Értékesítés, kereskedelem
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
távmunka, home office
angol - középfokú
Let’s be successful together!
Our multinational Partner is looking for an experienced colleague for the position below:
Sales support engineer
Feladatok
Own the bookings forecast for the segment and ensure monthly delivery of the volume commitment, as well as execute immediate recovery actions if any risk is identified;
Proactively work with customers to increase digital integration;
Be fluent in the benefits of digital integration and articulate a clear action plan for implementation;
Act as single human point of contact to secure customer satisfaction during and after the transition;
Provide pre- and post-sales support and regular follow-up;
Engage with customers through online chat tools, e-commerce platforms and other digital means (including Teams and phones) to assist customers in product selection, application support, access to expertise and placement of orders;
Understand in full Emerson’s unique selling propositions and actively contextualize them to the customer industry needs to maximize business;
Monitor digital tools and CRM for leads. Proactively act on leads to convert potential business in the assigned segments;
Understand and use available data analytics and reports to optimize account growth strategies, including whitespace analysis, pricing actions and customer segmentation;
Actively coordinate with colleagues and orchestrate the support of subject matter experts, Product Managers or other company stakeholders to create a compelling and differentiating value proposition for the selected customers;
Monitor and understand the competitive environment at each account and work to displace competition and defend Emerson’s position;
Keep track and communicate customer activities to the wider organization through CRM;
Proactively document and share success cases, customer feedback and quantifiable business results in the assigned customer segment.
Elvárások
STEM degree or comparable technical education;
Demonstrated experience selling technologies to customers in the relevant industry;
Experience in engaging with customers through digital platforms and driving e-commerce plans;
Excellent communication and presentation skill both in English and local language.
Amit kínálunk
Yearly bonus, meal contribution;
Sport facilities;
Life and accident insurance;
Work-life-balance, with flexible working hours;
2 days a week home office option after the trial period;
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest
Jelentkezés módja
"Küldje el jelentkezését a „Jelentkezem az állásra most” gombra való kattintással! A fényképes önéletrajzokat magyar és idegen nyelven várjuk. Kérjük, a levél tárgyába írja be a pozíció nevét és a referencia számát. Köszönjük! Hire-One Személyzeti Tanácsadó Kft. Nyilvántartási szám: 3376-1/2008."

Software Engineering Lead (Budapest)
Software Engineering Lead (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
5+ év tapasztalat
középvezető
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Software Engineering Lead
Very briefly, you will be working on some of our core systems that support our Client's flying crew members. From systems that enable planning and rostering of their crew to ensuring the right catering is placed onboard every flight, the 3 domains within Flight have a very diverse application landscape. Through your work, you will have a direct impact on their crew, their aircrafts, and their customers.
They offer a very open environment for you to grow and expand your talents, together you will contribute to their goal of becoming the number one data- and technology-driven airline.
In addition:
You will supervise a number of software engineers;
You will be the link between your department and the rest of the business;
You will be part of the tech management and you will give direction to technical solutions;
You will work with different programming tools
Our Client is a leading European airline. Their IT is a strong mature agile
organization with over 1.000 internal employees worldwide – but they are starting fresh in Budapest with a new start-up this year. Are you looking for a chance to work in truly European spirit with their future technological developments?
Together you fly 110 aircraft to 145 destinations, bringing millions of passengers to where they need to be, developing sustainable travel and pushing the boundaries of air travel towards to the future.
You love complex problems and enjoy solving them even more. You are not afraid of change. In fact, you want to constantly improve our Client's services. You speak various programming languages, but also enjoy coaching and guiding software engineers. You will be working in an environment that at this moment also relies on planning & rostering
systems or SAP (catering), knowledge on integrating COTS in custom applications and experience with DevOps is a pre.
Additionally, you have:
A college or university degree, preferably in IT or engineering;
Good knowledge of the English language
A strong knowledge of different programming languages:
Java;
TypeScript
Preferred but not necessary, secondary experience in:
Front end (Angular);
DevOps;
More than 7 years of proven experience in software development;
Proven leadership experience
Offer:
A challenging role at a unique European company
10% of your work time dedicated to personal development and a personal learning budget
10% bonus depending on individual as well as the company performance
Great flexible benefits such as: nursery, health care, pension, parking, SZEP card, etc.
Attractive discounts on airline tickets (after 6 months of service) with KLM and our partners
A personal budget for sustainable employability
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest
Jelentkezem az állásra ›

Principal Engineer, Full Stack Architect (Budapest)
Principal Engineer, Full Stack Architect (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Hays Hungary Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
5+ év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Principal Engineer, Full Stack Architect
Your new company
Our Partner designs and engineers connected products and solutions for automakers, consumers, and enterprises worldwide, including connected car systems, audio and visual products, enterprise automation solutions; and services supporting the Internet of Things. Our Partner is admired by audiophiles, musicians and the entertainment venues where they perform around the world. More than 25 million automobiles on the road today are equipped with our Partner’s audio and connected car systems. 
Our Partner’s software services power billions of mobile devices and systems that are connected, integrated and secure across all platforms, from work and home to car and mobile. Our Partner has a workforce of approximately 30,000 people across the Americas, Europe, and Asia. 
Our Partner offers a great work environment, challenging career opportunities, professional training and competitive compensation. Looking for a challenge where your experience is valued? Come see what you can achieve as a leader with our Partner! 
Your new role
The Principal Engineer – Full Stack Architect will be working with other architects to help define and develop our Partner’s desktop and cloud-based platforms associated with next-generation audio, video, light & control systems in Professional Solutions. This person will collaborate closely with other software teams as well as Product Management teams to identify, prioritize & develop software platforms. He/she will also be responsible to work closely with NPI teams to integrate software platforms in order to deliver successful products. 
What You Will Do 
Responsible for architecting, developing, deploying & maintaining desktop and cloud-based platforms associated with next-generation audio, video & control systems for Professional Solutions. 
Maintain a process-oriented culture for a team developing software products using agile methodologies. 
Participate in overall business planning by contributing current knowledge and future vision of how technology and systems will enable business strategy, growth, and competitive positioning. The CoC Software lead will propose projects derived from these regular planning sessions and align with the Platform leaders for their approval. Collaborate closely with GPLM & PMO groups to identify & prioritize the right platforms for development. 
Talent Management by being at the forefront of the technology curve and build up organization competencies within the group to address the new areas. 
Portfolio Management including ‘make or buy’ decisions in his field of expertise and have the ability to integrate acquired technologies into our Partner’s portfolio. 
Partner with NPI Teams to successfully launch Software Products in the market 
Financial & Commercial Acumen - The individual must have demonstrated an ability to think beyond the technology itself and will understand key business drivers that ensure technology investment will provide substantial value or improvements to customers. 
What you'll need to succeed
Master or Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Software Engineering, Electrical Engineering or a related technical discipline. 
Minimum of 10 years of experience in architecting & developing large-scale software applications using full-stack technologies (i.e. HTML, JavaScript, Angular, C#, NET). 
Experience with building highly scalable APIs supporting large high-volume mission-critical environments (Cloud applications (Azure), Large user base, etc ). 
Experience with NoSQL technologies like CosmosDB preferred. 
What is Nice to Have 
At least 5+ years of professional experience in cloud-based technologies and services. 
At least 1+ years of professional experience in Microsoft Azure Cloud. 
What you'll get in return
Access to employee discounts on our Partner’s world-class products 
Opportunity to collaborate with talented teams across the globe and make an impact on our Partner’s business. 
An inclusive and diverse work environment that fosters and encourages professional and personal development. 
Flexible work schedule with a culture encouraging work-life integration
What you need to do now
If you're interested in this role, click 'apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV, or call us now.
If this job isn't quite right for you but you are looking for a new position, please contact us for a confidential discussion on your career.

Linux System Administrator
Responsibilities
Works closely with our customer, functional business units and software developers to administer the customer’s system to accomplish operation 24/5
Provision and operation of customer’s system 24/5
Current upkeep, care, maintenance, upgrades 
Analysis and removal of occurring problems according to documentation 
Performing backups and restores 
Constant communication to involved units and partners 
Reporting 
Our partner company is a worldwide leading supplier of lottery products. With more than 8,500 employees worldwide and currently serves more than 400 customers on six continents today.
Requirements
Good knowledge of Linux systems is mandatory, Oracle and Application Servers are desirable 
IP networking, virtualization and backup systems experience is required 
Basic knowledge of SAN, FC, storage systems 
Work experience with server hardware 
Excellent English (verbal & written) is mandatory, good German is desirable 
Stress resistant, team player, ready to work in shifts 
Previous experience in working according to ITIL based processes and functions is desirable 
Minimum of 3 year’s relevant experience 
Bachelor degree is an advantage 
​Offer
Economically stable and growing enterprise in a high-tech environment 
Excellent working atmosphere 
Competitive remuneration package
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest

Senior DevOps Engineer (Budapest)
A hirdetés már lejárt!
EasyHiring Services Kft.

3 - 5 év tapasztalat

angol - középfokú
Senior DevOps Engineer
Aegon Global Technology Services (GTS) provides IT infrastructure and application support services to the Aegon businesses. GTS is responsible for the provision, support and ongoing maintenance of IT operating platforms, applications and services. There is also a strong connection with external providers necessitating vendor and service provider management. GTS is responsible for driving the technology strategy and providing IT infrastructure solutions that are in alignment with business objectives and the GTS technology strategy.
What You Will Do:
Develop, Deploy and Support Cloud Infrastructure, as code artifacts or modules;
Design, Build and Maintain Cloud infrastructure and applications;
Support and deliver using Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery pipelines;
Design and Support resiliency and scalability using AWS and other cloud platforms;
Enable systems with automated monitoring and alerting;
Support the Team and Customers with day-to-day requests, Change and Incident tickets;
Support Technology stack refresh on Systems (end-to-end) when required;
Ensure automated security is built into each technology stack
What You Will Need:
Qualifications;
Four-year Computer Science or related degree, or equivalent work experience;
3 or more years of experience including 2 years of experience in supporting enterprise-level platform installations;
3 years of experience working with cloud providers (Azure/ AWS, etc..);
At least 2 years of experience with Agile development and planning methodologies;
2-3 years of experience working in a high performing DevOps team or role;
2-3 years of experience in performance monitoring, alerting and troubleshooting in an enterprise;
Strong, holistic understanding of the internet and hosting from the network layer up through the application layer
Preferred:
Experience working in roles with a strong focus on security, including automated alerting and response;
Demonstrate a strong understanding of API’s and API Security;
Demonstrated ability in automated code testing;
Certifications in relevant technologies, methods, or platforms;
Demonstrate the key critical behaviors of commitment to task, communication, customer focus, decision;
Making/problem solving, tolerance of ambiguity, planning, prioritizing, and goal setting
Offers
Very good development opportunities in a global company;
Workplace in a pleasant atmosphere with motivated and team-oriented colleagues;
Diverse and interesting tasks and projects;
Competitive salary
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest

Jelentkezem az állásra ›

angol - középfokú
Salesforce developer
As a Salesforce Developer you will be responsible for the ongoing development, support and maintenance of our Salesforce.com platform, within a small team of Product Owners, Salesforce Architects, Developers and Admins. 
You will work alongside a team of software engineers and analysts using technology to solve business problems. The team structure gives opportunity for growth and to have an impact from day 1.
Your responsibilities 
Meeting with project managers to determine CRM needs
Developing customized solutions within the Salesforce platform
Designing, coding, and implementing Salesforce applications
Creating timelines and development goals
Testing the stability and functionality of the application
Troubleshooting and fixing bugs
Writing documents and providing technical training for Salesforce staff
Maintaining the security and integrity of the application software
Working with 3rd party vendors and external APIs
Focus the organization’s use of data towards what best serves the mission
Striving towards coding best practices and data quality
Skills required 
Bachelor’s degree in computer science or software engineering
Previous work experience with application and software development
Experienced in Apex, JavaScript, LWC and VisualForce.
Competency in HTML, XML, SQL, Java or C++, REST and SOAP-based web services
Experience in SFDX and CI/CD
Good communication skills
Familiarity with developing on other cloud platforms, such as Microsoft Azure or Amazon Web Services
Experience required 
2+ years of experience as a Salesforce developer
4+ years working with Salesforce
com certified Platform Developer I
Additional Sales Cloud, Service Cloud and Developer certifications preferred

angol - középfokú
DevOps Engineer
To strengthen our team, we are looking for DevOps Engineer.
What to expect:
Work in an awesome team .
Conception, realization and support of future-oriented cloud infrastructure solutions as well as support of our software products in cooperation with developers and administrators .
Operation & monitoring of our digital touchpoints .
Develop and implement solutions in the area of operations, release management, security, multi-cloud computing .
Active technical support in 2nd and 3rd level .
Work with cutting-edge technologies.
Continuous learning.
Provide training on new technologies and improvements for other DevOps Engineers.
What convinces us:
Experience in working Microsoft Azure Cloud
Experience in the following tools: Git, Terraform, Docker, Kubernetes, Helm, npm,
Experience scripting in Bash, Python .
Experience in the DevOps environment as well as with containerization and server administration .
Experience in the application of agile methods in an agile team .
Good communication and teamwork skills.
High IT Affinity and willingness to learn new tools and technologies.
Fluency in English
What we offer you:
The love of animals is our Fressnapf DNA – if you have a dog, you can bring him/her to work with you
Unique corporate culture – with us you will experience openness, transparency and appreciation in an innovative, dynamic environment – because we love what we do
Here you can be YOU, the “you” culture will be used across entire company and across all hierarchical levels
An extremely successful business model in combination with permanent expansion and high growth, even in uncertain times
Work-life balance and flexible working hours – with us you have the opportunity use the advantages of mobile working
Because you deserve it! – Attractive remuneration as well as various additional services and benefits, e.g. employee discounts or cafeteria scheme, are a matter of course for us
Stay connected! – Cohesion is very important to us: with the employee app or digital
We Care! – The well-being of our employees is important to us
Your development is important to us – we support you with a wide range of learning opportunities
Working place: Hungary, Budapest

Cloud Engineer (Azure) (Budapest)
Cloud Engineer (Azure) (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
5+ év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Azure Cloud Engineer
In your daily work, you will:
Leverage cutting edge technologies like Kubernetes, Terraform, Docker, Spring Boot to design and build new Identity and Access Management products for the Cloud;
Take end-to-end responsibility for your engineered results and automate everything to scale our Cloud service;
Work on all layers (infrastructure as code, automation monitoring) using open source components and open standards;
Integrate new components and technologies into existing software systems and architectures
Do on the job trainings;
Mentor junior colleagues (do code reviews, give support in technical design, etc.);
Use Scrum, TDD and modern software development methodologies
Our partner company is looking for their new Azure Cloud Engineer member to help fuel their rapid growth and expansion of their Cloud engineering team. If you are interested in cybersecurity and protection of customer identities, we are looking forward to your application.
For this challenging position, you must have:
Strong Cloud Provider and/or Kubernetes/Docker expertise;
You are a Clean Code evangelist and have experience in developing Java applications with Spring Boot;
Proven track record using Terraform, Ansible or similar to automate infrastructure in production settings;
Professional experience with cloud native development and 12-factor principles are a plus;
A university degree (MSc/BSc) in Computer Science or a related field - or similar
Local benefits: 
Medicover white package 
The first 15 days of sickness will be compensated with 100% salary
Celebration of life decisions: 
Immediate relatives wedding: 1 additional vacation day 
Own marriage/entry of legal partnership: 2 additional vacation days
Wedding gift: a surprise of 100.000 HUF
Moving one's own household: 1 additional vacation day 
Family-friendly benefits: 
Paternity leave on childbirth/adoption leave for mother and father: 10 vacation days
GYÁP (caring for sick children): the first 15 days of sickness will be compensated with 100% salary 
Nursery and Kindergarten support up to HUF 60,000/month 
Childbirth and adoption gift: a surprise of 100.000 HUF for each event
Unpaid leave: 
From the 3rd year of service, unpaid leave is possible up to 2 months while the company continues paying the social security insurance
After 5 years of service, unpaid leave is possible up to 6 months while the company continues paying the social security insurance 
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest
