Senior Software Engineer (Budapest)
Senior Software Engineer (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Senior Software Developer
- Being an experienced senior member in a software team developing safety-critical and mobility-focused embedded software
- Design new algorithms and develop adaptions to existing algorithms for vehicle motion control, user interfaces, actuator and energy management with the software development team
- Manage implementation of systems tests, debugging and diagnostics and analyse resulting data
- Plan, design, and optimize automated test cases and CI/CD pipelines with the software test team
- Participate in design and code reviews within our software development lifecycle
- Generate and analyze requirements and specifications from stakeholders
- Collaborate with other software engineers, electrical, mechanical, systems, and product teams to resolve issues
Our international Australian partner is focused on the future of mobility on the field of autonomous and electric vehicles. They are looking for an experienced Senior Software Developer to join to their growing team. 
- An Engineering or Computer Science degree, or equivalent experience
- A passionate interest in electric transport and an interest in developing new generations of electric vehicles
- Proven experience in building and releasing production ECU or controller software packages in relevant engineering projects
- Proficiency in embedded software development in C/C++, model-based development in Simulink
- Proficiency with automotive or industrial communications such as CAN and Ethernet
- Experience with the v-model automotive software development lifecycle
- Experience with software functional safety implementations and optionally, ISO26262 certifications
- Strong understanding of vehicle dynamics, control theory and sensors
- Enjoy working in a fast-paced and growing global team environment
- Ability to work independently with a strong team ethos
- Capable of mentoring junior engineers in the software engineering domain
- Minimum of 5 years of experience in software development in industry
- Proficient in Hungarian and English
It's an advantage if you also have:
- General knowledge of embedded electronics development and the ability to read schematic diagrams
- Understanding of the standards of functional safety ISO26262, IEC61508 and/or ASIL
- Technical experience related to electronic systems at a component, sub-system and system level
- An ability to analyse test results, highlight abnormalities and present outcomes to an audience with a range of technical expertise
- Cross functional knowledge across the disciplines of electronics, mechatronics, and software
- Experienced with Microsoft Office suite
- Strong interpersonal and communication skills
- Work at an exciting technology company within Hungary delivering globally in a multi-national group
- Enjoy a clear sense of ownership in your field, with the satisfaction of working on developments that create the future of a new category of autonomous vehicles
- Work alongside a friendly and passionate team on cutting edge technology
- Have the opportunity to travel to other company offices including Australia and the UK
- Enjoy modern office space and great work environment
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest
Jelentkezem az állásra ›

Álláshirdetés-feladás
 Regisztráció ›
 Belépés ›
Reporting Applications Lead Analyst (Székesfehérvár)
Reporting Applications Lead Analyst (Székesfehérvár)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Középfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - felsőfokú
Reporting Applications Lead Analyst
Feladatok:
Segítségnyújtás a jelentéskészítési megoldás karbantartásával, támogatásával, felügyeletével és stratégiai használatával kapcsolatos stratégiák és szabályzatok kialakításában és végrehajtásában.
Kapcsolattartás a szervezeten belül, elemzőkkel, vezetéssel, ügyfelekkel és 3külső szállítókkal.
Segítse az üzleti partnereket és az ügyfeleket jelentéskészítési és elemzési igényeik kielégítésében, és alakítsa át azokat funkcionális követelményekké.
Koordinálja az egész vállalatban használható adatmodellek tervezését és fejlesztését, és vezeti az olyan analitikai megoldások megvalósítását, amelyek előmozdítják a szervezet adatstratégiáját, és elősegítik az adatok integritását és minőségét.
Részvétel és támogatás a jelentéskészítő szoftver rendszerfrissítéseiben, telepítéseiben, konfigurálásában és technológiai bővítésében.
Aktív szerep a fejlesztési gyakorlatok, szabványok, eljárások és ellenőrzések fenntartásában és javításában (pl. dokumentáció, fejlesztés és tesztelés).
Dokumentumok kiadási megjegyzései és képzési anyagok kidolgozása üzleti felhasználók számára.
Tanulmányok és végzettségek:
Akkreditált intézmény alapképzése vagy 3 év kiegészítő informatikai tapasztalat a diploma helyett.
Szakmai tapasztalat:
Lehetőleg GL-számviteli területen szerzett 3-5 éves tapasztalat 
Technológiai tudás:
Korábbi tapasztalat a jelentéskészítés és a BI-eszközök terén
MS Office alkalmazások használatában való jártasság
ERP rendszer ismerete
Nyelvtudás:
Angol nyelvismeret felsőfokon

Kiváló kommunikációs készség

Senior Java Backend fejlesztő - Erős angol és középfokú német tudás - 100% Remote munka - Kiemelt bérezés!
/*100% remote munka - Német-magyar vállalkozás - 5+ év tapasztalat Java, Spring, Rest technológiákkal - Kiemelt bérezés*/ Partnerünk német nyelvterületen lévő ügyfelei számára végez szoftverfejlesztési tevékenységet. IT tevékenységük magas színvonalon tartása mellett partnerei igényeinek maximális kielégítésére és a hosszú távú kapcsolatok kiépítésére törekednek. Alapvető értékeik a szakmai tudás mellett a családias, támogató munkahelyi légkör, nyitott és egymást segítő hozzáállás. Most Java fejlesztő kollégát keresnek Scrum csapatukba, egy induló autóipari projektre! Feladatok:
Architekturális feladatok ellátása
Követelményelemzés, architektúra készítése és dokumentálása, programozás
Teszt architektúra és dokumentáció
Tesztek programozása, illetve Devops feladatok
Kiemelten fontos a fejlesztés során angol (bizonyos esetekben német) nyelvű dokumentáció készítése illetve Unit/modul tesztek írása
Kisebb tervezési feladatok
A programozás nyelve az angol.
Munkavégzés helye
Remote

Computer Graphics Programmer - Game Development
/* Award-winning game developer company || Modern work environment || International projects */
An award-winning game developer company, founded in 2002, is looking for its new graphics programmer colleague. They develop action games for XBox One, Playstation 4, and PC, and recently opened their new office in Budapest. The team that you will join works on the two most prominent online games of the company.
Main responsibilities:
Implementing new rendering features
Shaders
Optimizations

IT Contract Management Specialist - German (Magyarország)
IT Contract Management Specialist - German (Magyarország)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Hays Hungary Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - felsőfokú
német - felsőfokú
IT Contract Management Specialist - German
Would you like to continue your career as an IT Contract Management Specialist? Do you like animal-friendly companies? Then you don't have to look any further because Fressnapf is hiring a German speaking colleagues to join its Procurement team.
What to expect
The IT Contract Administration team will focus on two main areas. The team will work in close cooperation to fulfil End to End management of IT Contract Delivery: from issuing Purchase Orders based on existing contracts, monitoring delivery, throughout managing invoicing cycle. The responsibilities include supplier and client relationship management on tactical level.
Role 1 is focusing on end to end order management:
After interpreting existing IT contracts, create Purchase Orders to suppliers (both for services and goods),
Monitor PO approval, and service/ goods delivery
Throughout delivery phase act as single point of contact to our Suppliers (manage any discrepancy – price or quantity, in case modification of the order is needed, act on it)
Close coordination with Service Level and Supplier and Contract Management
Having delivery confirmed by the requestors and follow up on them in in SAP, (booking GR and close the PO)
Role 2 is focusing on:
Controlling the financial settlement of suppliers,
Booking invoices to SAP
Checking of invoices, control of increase and decrease of services.
Reconciliation of invoices with proof of services provided by our suppliers;
Preparing monthly invoices for IT services and charging them to the branches
Control of the financial management process
Contact person for franchise partners
What convinces us
Fluency in English and German languages
Around 3 years of relevant experience in Contract Management/Procurement/Tactical Buyer/Strategic Buyer roles
IT affinity
SAP knowledge – SAP MM, FI modules
Deep knowledge of Contract Management: knowledge of different clauses and ability to understand a contract and create PO based on it
Experience in IT procurement or as an IT Buyer is a great advantage
What we offer you
The love of animals is our Fressnapf DNA – if you have a dog, you can bring him/her to work with you
Unique corporate culture – with us you will experience openness, transparency and appreciation in an innovative, dynamic environment – because we love what we do
Here you can be YOU, the “you” culture will be used across entire company and across all hierarchical levels
An extremely successful business model in combination with permanent expansion and high growth, even in uncertain times
Work-life balance and flexible working hours – with us you have the opportunity use the advantages of mobile working
Because you deserve it! – Attractive remuneration as well as various additional services and benefits, e.g. employee discounts or cafeteria scheme, are a matter of course for us
Stay connected! – Cohesion is very important to us: with the employee app or digital
We Care! – The well-being of our employees is important to us
Your development is important to us – we support you with a wide range of learning opportunities
If you are interested in the position, please send us your up-to-date, English CV.
Jelentkezem az állásra ›

Operations Coordinator (Vas megye)
Operations Coordinator (Vas megye)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Hays Hungary Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Operations Coordinator
Your new company
Our partner is a leading international technology group in the areas of specialty glass, glass-ceramics and glass innovations. They are looking for a new colleague to join their new pharma unit.
Your new role
You coordinate process and document requests (incidents, changes) received from key users of different locations as well as maintenance activities 
You narrow down root causes, derive necessary tasks and organize with locations and our technical experts 
You will be involved in support tasks (2nd/3rd level) and troubleshooting 
You support roll-out projects both from organizational and technical point of view
You provide training for users on our IT applications in production, plant maintenance and quality
You establish a good relationship to the key users of the different locations and gather a good understanding of their requirements and collect ideas for continuous improvement
What you'll need to succeed
You have a degree (B.Sc.) in computer science, engineering or natural sciences; alternatively, you have a comparable qualification through a completed apprenticeship with several years (3-5 years) of work experience and have a strong understanding of IT 
You have experience with ITSM tools (e.g. ServiceNow) and tools for agile working methods (e.g. Jira & Confluence) 
You have practical experience in the operation (and implementation) of production-related software systems/ applications in a production-related environment (MES, PDA, CAQ, etc.) 
You have first experience in the administration of both Linux (e.g. Debian) and Windows system, as well as the development of scripts and applications for automated administration 
You have a good understanding on virtualization, container- and cloud-based deployments as well as the management of services based on Docker & Co. 
If you gained first experience with GMP related tasks, is a plus 
Good communication skills, especially in English, a team oriented working style distinguish you 
You enjoy to work in a diverse and locally distributed team 
What you'll get in return
You can expect a unique corporate culture where we emphasize equity, diversity and inclusion. We know: motivated and committed employees are the condition for the success of our company.
You can expect interesting tasks and challenging projects, as well as motivated and friendly teams in fields that influence our future. 
What you need to do now
If you're interested in this role, click 'apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV, or call us now.
If this job isn't quite right for you but you are looking for a new position, please contact us for a confidential discussion on your career.

Program Analytics
Responsibilities
Support the execution and maintenance of analytics and reporting processes, including dashboard creation using our Business Intelligence toolset
Complete all BAU deliverables independently and on time
Build and maintain relationships with relevant stakeholders
Monitor and track progress on initiatives
Support documentation processes: business requirement gathering, process flows 
Participate in data and analytics employee engagement and peer learning opportunities 
Our Client is one of the leading investment banks in the world, and for their growing professional team we are looking for an Automation Team Manager.
Qualifications
1+ years work experience in quantitative business analytics or similar role
Enthusiasm for helping team members improve their skills and grow their careers
Excellent written and spoken communications skills for advanced analytical concepts
Attention to detail, sense of urgency, and commitment to deadlines
Experience using data analytics applications and various reporting tools
Comfort interacting and negotiating with leaders at all levels in the organization
Able to influence other teams and stakeholders without authority
Comfortable working through ambiguous situations autonomously
We'd love to see experience with some of the following
Experience and/or training in Tableau Creator or Tableau Explorer or any other BI solution
Experience in the business travel, transportation, office supplies, paper products, forestry management, or other relevant industries
Experience or education in library and information science, data management and analytics, or similar disciplines with quantitative and qualitative analytics focus
Exposure to workflow management tools such as JIRA
Truly flexible work arrangements in an organization that acknowledges life - work balance
Competitive compensation package
Career management and mentoring by senior colleagues and leaders
Opportunity for participation in managerial development initiatives
Inclusive and friendly corporate culture where we welcome all
We firmly believe in equal opportunity for everyone
A socially active team and communities with diverse networking opportunities
Online and classroom training options throughout the year
A supportive workplace for professionals returning to the office from childcare leave

C++ szoftverfejlesztő - Termékfejlesztés
/* Izgalmas termékfejlesztés - C++ desktop platform - Sikeres növekedő cég - Heti 1 nap bejárás */ Partnerünk egy 2020-ban alakult IT szektorban tevékenykedő cég. Termékük népszerűsége most kezd el igazán berobbanni, így bővíteni kívánják fókuszált csapatukat. Ha szeretnél egy gyorsan fejlődő cég munkatársa lenni, jelentkezz még ma! Ha most csatlakozol, még kulcs szerepet tölthetsz be a sikerek előtt álló cég életében. Jelenleg tapasztalt C++ fejlesztő kollégát keresünk 6 fős csapatukba. Feladatok:
C++ alapú szoftverfejlesztés
Saját termék továbbfejlesztése
További termékverziók készítésében való részvétel
Nyílt forráskódú szoftver elemzése
Forráskód módosítások, patchek változtatása a termék fejlesztése során
Együttműködés a csapat többi tagjával
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest, 1. kerület + HO

Szenior Teszt Automatizáló Mérnök - Python - FinTech (Budapest)
Szenior Teszt Automatizáló Mérnök - Python - FinTech (Budapest)
A hirdetés már lejárt!
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
Szenior Teszt Automatizáló Mérnök - Python - FinTech
/* Belvárosi iroda - Home Office lehetőség - Egészségbiztosítás - Éves bónusz - Részvény opció */ FinTech területen tevékenykedő partnerünk szenior automatizált tesztelő kollegát keres Pythonos tudással 70 fős csapatába, hogy ügyfélközpontú termékeik tesztelésében segítse a csapatot. Ha szívesen foglalkozol tesztek automatizálásával, ugyanakkor kiválóan értesz a tesztforgatókönyvek meghatározásához, akkor partnerünk Téged keres, hogy jelentős szerepet tölts be fő termékeik és zöldmezős kezdeményezéseik általános minőségének fejlesztésében.
Feladataid lesznek:
Együttműködés a különböző mérnöki csapatokkal és a termékmenedzsmenttel a termékek széles skálájának tesztelése érdekében
Te fogod írni és végrehajtani a tesztterveket a termékkövetelményeknek megfelelően
Kapcsolattartás a beszállítóval és belső érdekeltekkel a követelmények, és felmerülő kérdések kapcsán
Közvetlenül felelős leszel a termék funkciókészletének teszteléséért
Termék teljes életciklusában való részvétel, létező és jövőbeli funkciókészletek követelményeinek összegyűjtése, tesztesetek készítése
A már meglévő és jövőbeli teszttervek automatizálása
Funkcionális és nem funkcionális tesztelési folyamatok javítása, minőségi kapuk meghatározása
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest IX. kerület
Neked ajánlott állások
Neked ajánlott állások
BKV Zrt. -
IT szolgáltatásmenedzser
Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions -
DevOps Engineer (VNI 1 NNA_ACC Squad) (REF220B)
HVG Kiadó Zrt. -

Graphics Programmer - MMO játékfejlesztés - R&D részleg
/* Díjnyertes európai játékfejlesztő cég - MMO játékok - FPS */
Számos díjat elnyert nemzetközi játékfejlesztő cég keres FPS játék fejlesztéséhez új grafikai fejlesztő kollegákat. Ha jártas vagy a játékfejlesztésben, és szeretnél egy olyan vállalathoz csatlakozni, mely már több, mint 30 sikeres játékot fejlesztett és dobott piacra, vagy részt vennél egy népszerű online multiplayer játék továbbfejlesztésében, amihez már játékosok milliói csatlakoztak, akkor ragadd meg a lehetőséget! A 120 fős cég budapesti R&D részlegén most egy hamarosan piacra kerülő játék renderelési munkálataiban vehetsz részt.
Főbb feladataid lesznek:
Renderelési technológiák kutatása, implementálása és optimalizálása
Következő generációs konzolokra való fejlesztés
Új funkciók hozzáadása a rendering enginehez, end-to-end
Hibajavítások
Részvétel a code review folyamatokban
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest

IT Architect (.NET)
Your focus will be:
Architectural design for industry 4.0 solutions using domain-driven design and microservice architecture patterns
Design and development of a computer vision/AI solution framework - including machine learning, backend and frontend development, corresponding DevOps and automation tasks
Design of technical solution architectures based on Microsoft Azure services, Databricks, .NET / C#, Angular, Kubernetes and Terraform
Working together with other professionals like product owners, business experts, solution architects and the development team to engineer solutions aligned with architecture guidelines.
Documentation and presenting results to the program leadership and stakeholders
Steering of the development team, orchestration of activities during the sprint and assurance of quality of results
Our Partner is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. They are looking for a new senior colleague to join their team in the following position:
IT ARCHITECT
Requirements you should fulfill:
At least a Bachelor's degree (Master's preferred) in IT
At least 3 years of experience in a similar position (Lead software developer, IT Architect etc.)
Some experience in agile software development
Practical experience with Azure, DevOps, .NET, Angular, Kubernetes and Terraform
Familiarity with the fundamentals of Data Science, Machine Learning, AI, and MLOps
A good understanding of low-level communication protocols.
Excellent verbal and written English language skills (German is a plus)
Soft skills we look for:
Team player attitude 
A result-oriented and systematic work approach
Excellent conceptual skills and an ability to structure complex topics
Autonomous, self-driven, flexible, reliable, and keen to push things forward
What our partner offers:
Home office or remote work opportunity
A job full of challenges and high-level professional activities
Stable international company background
Participation in international projects and commission to foreign countries
Career opportunities, continuous training program and language courses
Competitive salary and performance-related bonus
Cafeteria with optional elements
School start support
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest

Solution Architect (Budapest)
Solution Architect (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Hays Hungary Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Solution Architect
Job overview
The Solution Architect develops detailed architecture solutions for projects and products, which are implemented by the respective teams in close coordination with him. He records the ACTUAL and TARGET status and describes migration paths, taking into account technical, organizational and process-related interrelationships. This is done in close collaboration with the Enterprise Architects to create standards-compliant solutions, exploit potential for synergies across multiple initiatives, and coordinate cross-team releases.
What you’ll do (Tasks & Responsibilities)
Detailed planning, analysis and design of technical solutions. This can include architectures across multiple teams as well as the detailed architecture of a single application down to component level
Alignment of project and product architecture with enterprise architecture
Analysis, documentation and optimization of data flows, interfaces, software architecture, system architecture
Consideration of DSGVO and security requirements in projects
Evaluate business requirements and develop solutions in the form of products or services
Actively lead technical vision to success
What you’ll need to be succesful ( Experience & Qualifications)
Good analyst and moderator
Degree in computer science or business informatics or comparable knowledge
3 years of experience as IT and/or software architect
Good knowledge and experience with agile methods such as Kanban and Scrum
Expert in cutting of topic complexes in domains
Knowledge of at least one programming language such as Python, Java, PHP, JavaScript, TypeScript
Knowledge and experience in the design and development of web applications
Experience in the design of micro-services
Workplace Budapest

MS Analyst (Budapest)

A hirdetés már lejárt!
Hays Hungary Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
SSC (Shared Service Center)
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség

távmunka, home office
angol - középfokú
MS Analyst
Managed Service Analyst position opened at our multinational client's Budapest office. They build enterprise cloud technology that powers the biggest names in the pharmaceutical, consumer goods, chemical & cosmetics industries. Their technology has transformed these industries; enabling them to get critical products and services to market faster. The company provides a professional working environment for junior employees as well and they can offer the chance to build up a career.
Your new role as a Managed Service Analyst includes:
Supporting Client with product customisation,
Providing development, integration and continuous innovation of the product,
Finding new ways of troubleshooting,
Supporting the building and testing processes.
You are our ideal candidate if you:
Have an University degree or higher education certificate,
Speak fluent English,
Are confident Excel user,
Have 1-3 years of experience in SSC environment,
Have experience in Helpdesk/Data analysis, management/BI/Report management/Reporting,
Own a great problem-solving and analytical.
What you'll get in return:
Competitive salary package,
International environment at one of worlds biggest cloud technology company,
Opportunity to build up a career and learn from experienced senior colleagues,
Home Office - even 5/5 days home office on the long term.
What you need to do now
If you're interested in this role, click 'apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV, or call us now.
If this job isn't quite right for you but you are looking for a new position, please contact us for a confidential discussion on your career.

EasyHiring Services Kft.

Középfokú végzettség

angol - középfokú
Full-stack developer (node.js)
Feladatok:
a cég által fejlesztett videotechnikai berendezések vezérlőszoftverének fejlesztése;
meeting room-ok vagy akár teljes irodaházak automatizált vezérlését lehetővé tevő komplex szoftverek fejlesztése;
felületek és funkciók kialakítása a terveknek megfelelően;
fejlesztési folyamatok kidolgozása és javítása;
jól strukturált, igényes kód írása.
Ügyfelünk precíziós videojel-kezelési termékeket tervez és gyárt csúcskategóriás alkalmazásokhoz, több iparágban.
Elvárások:
legalább 3 év fejlesztői tapasztalat;
magabiztos node.js, Javascript, HTML5, CSS 3 ismeret;
Responsive Web Design fejlesztési tapasztalat;
verziókövető rendszer ismeret;
középfokú angol nyelvtudás.
Előny:
NPM ismeret;
hálózati alapismeret: TCP/IP, Telnet, SSH, Http(s), Websocket;
használtál már Express framework-öt, esetleg valamilyen templating engine-t (pl. EJS, Jade, Pug);
rendelkezel SCSS, jQuery, Bootstrap ismeretekkel;
dolgoztál már CI rendszerekkel (pl. Jenkins).
Ajánlatok:
széleskörű szakmai fejlődési lehetőség;
betanulás után heti 2 nap home office lehetőség;
dinamikusan fejlődő és stabil háttér;
emberközpontú szemlélet;
belvárosi, jól megközelíthető iroda;
magas színvonalú csapatépítő tréningek és egyéb közösségépítő programok.
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest

Service Desk Agent- Italian-speaking
Would you like to work at a leading multinational company? Do you speak English and Italian fluently and would like to build your career? If yes, do not hesitate to apply! 
Responsibilities:
Answer incoming calls to the Service Desk
Provide first line support for users requiring assistance 
Provide basic administration of Access Management, End User Management, accounts and passwords
Escalate incidents to the appropriate IT operations resources in accordance with established procedure
Monitor open tickets for accuracy, urgency and problem resolution 
Ensure continuous availability during shift in the telephony system 
Identify of any areas of improvement
Requirements:
Fluent English and Italian (written and oral)
Strong knowledge of Microsoft based operating systems 
Excellent communication and customer service skills
Problem solving skills
What our client offers:
Cafeteria and Private Health Care Insurance
Flexible working arrangements and home office possibilities
Structured onboarding support
Diverse career paths 
Development opportunities (language courses, online learning courses)
Company and team events and possibility to join social groups
Advantages:
Experience in IT / in Service desk

Tapasztalt Java fejlesztő - Alkalmazott - Banki, biztosítói ügyfelek
/* Alkalmazott - Nagyvállalati ügyfélkör - Dinamikusan fejlődő cég - Belső szakmai és soft skill képzések */
Több, mint 10 éve alapított IT fejlesztői partnercégünkhöz keresünk új medior vagy senior Java fejlesztő kollégát. A jelenleg 60 fős cég számára fontos a folyamatos fejlődés és hogy alkalmazottaik számára is biztosítsák a rendszeres képzéseket. Emellett kiváló munkakörülményeket és versenyképes juttatást biztosítanak.
Feladatok:
Önálló fejlesztői feladatok ellátása agilis csapatban
Nagyvállalati JEE alkalmazások tervezése és fejlesztése, hibaelhárítás, technikai problémák meghatározása és megoldása
Junior fejlesztők mentorálása
Fejlesztői tesztelés és dokumentációk készítése
UI és UX tervezésben részvétel
A használt technológiák az ügyféltől függően változnak (JSF, Angular, Spring, Oracle adatbázisok, GIT, SVN). Jira ticketing rendszert hasznánlak, és nagyrészt Scrumban dolgoznak.
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest belvárosa, ügyfélnél csapatban
Jelentkezem az állásra ›

Feladatok:

Az informatikai infrastruktúra rendszeres felülvizsgálata, elemzés és jelentés készítése

System administrator (german speaking)
Tasks

Execution of installations, updates, upgrades, increments, and migrations of the technical control system

Our partner is a major company in the energy industry. They are involved in various power generation technologies such as gas turbines, hybrid power plants, generators, and transformers. They also provide modern and sustainable solutions for energy transport and storage. We are looking for a system administrator to join their team.

Az elektronikus aláírási megoldást biztosító program fejlesztése, a technikai supportot nyújtó kollégák kompetenciáin túlmutató nagyvállalati ügyfelek támogatása az alkalmazásaik implementációjában:

SAP Consultant (PP)
Responsibilities
ABAP Programming in the Production Logistics area
Create IT concepts and functional specifications
Provide support for the SAP PP applications for different locations
Analyze of reported Incidents and define rapid solutions for the production
Test and Documentation of new program developments
Technical Rollout of existing PP-templates to other locations
Coordination of work packages in projects as well as small orders
Our client is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. With its comprehensive technology portfolio, the company offers integrated solutions for established vehicle manufacturers, mobility providers and start-up companies in the fields of transportation and mobility.
Requirements
Degree in (Business) Informatics
More than 3 years of experience in development of SAP solutions - ABAP and ABAP OO
Knowledge of SAP logistics processes, ideally PP
Flexibility and good team player
Good communication skills, including the virtual team environment
Advantages
S/4 HANA, FIORI/UI5 skills are appreciated, as well as APO- PP/DS or IBP Know How
Willingness to travel
German language knowledge appreciated
​Offer
Stable company background and long-term working possibility
Full of challenges and high-level professional activities at an international company
Participation in international projects and commission to foreign countries
Career opportunities, continuous training program and language courses
Competitive salary and performance-related bonus
Cafeteria with optional elements
Home office work
School start support

C++ Software Developer
Leírás
Megbízó partnerünk számára keresünk munkatársat, Medior / Senior C++ Software Developer pozícióba szegedi lokációval. Partnerünk Európa egyik legnagyobb mérnöki és technológiai csoportja, Magyarország vezető informatikai cége.
C++ Software Developer
Feladatok
C++/MFC/COM alkalmazás karbantartása,
Alkalmazkodás az új operációs rendszerhez vagy a környezet egyéb változásaihoz,
Hibareprodukció, hibakeresés és -javítás,
Fejlesztések végrehajtása.
Elvárások
Szakirányú végzettség (IT területen),
Legalább 4 éves C++ programozási tapasztalat,
Kommunikációképes angol nyelvtudás,
Analitikus gondolkodás, proaktivitás, precíz munkavégzés,
OOP, OOD ismerete,
Komplex rendszerek fejlesztésében szerzett tapasztalat.
Előnyök:
Német tudás,
Windows ismeretek,
Érdeklődés az automatizálási technikák iránt,
Ipari automatizálás területén szerzett tapasztalat,
Rational Clear Case vagy más konfigurációkezelő rendszerben szerzett tapasztalat.
Amit kínálunk
Vonzó kompenzációs csomag,
Magán egészségbiztosítás a Medicovernél,
Home office lehetőség és rugalmas munkaidő,
Parkolási bérlet,
Fiatal, dinamikus, támogató csapat mentorral,
Modern munkakörnyezet,
Nemzetközi projektekben való részvétel lehetősége,
200+ képzési lehetőség: Nyelvi, soft-skill és technikai tréningek,
Karrierlehetőségek,
Családbarát munkahely.

Java Developer (Budapest)
Java Developer (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Hays Hungary Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Java Developer
Your new company
Would you like to work with one of the leading investment companies? Develop yourself and your career in a highly multicultural and giving environment – as a Java Developer!
Your new role
spearheading the development of backend stack, architecting, and building backend projects,
being involved in inception to delivery of various features and products on a results-oriented and exciting product roadmap,
working with project managers, technical leads, business owners, and analysts through the entire SDLC, understanding and refining systems requirements, working in Agile model,
participating in setting coding standards and guidelines for web applications, identify and detail best practices,
helping the team continuously improve processes and ways of working,
being curious and eager to learn new things,
willing to embrace work outside of your comfort zone, and open to mentorship from others; you make mistakes, but learn from them,
being passionate about technology, with personal ownership for the work you do.
What you'll need to succeed
3+ years hands-on Java development experience with services-oriented architectures and Java application servers (JBoss, Apache, Spring Framework)
Experience with Test Driven Development (JUnit, TestNG, EasyMock, JMock)
Ability of writing clean, future proof code with proper unit testing
Knowledge of at least one distributed version control system ideally Git
Good written and verbal communication skills in English
Understanding the Agile project management disciplines, with an emphasis on Scrum
Strong teamwork, communication, and time management abilities
Is a plus:
Experience with Docker/Kubernetes and Helm
Experience with Azure DevOps
Experience with frameworks like Angular, React, Node.js, Typescript
Knowledge of the core JavaScript and solid understanding of at least one JavaScript libraries like rxjs or ngrx
Solid understanding and experience of HTML 5 and CSS
What you'll get in return
Our partner provides support in any formal and informal way possible:
competitive salary package, cafeteria, private health insurance,
training and a mentor program for a smooth start, further soft and hard skill trainings on the long term,
an open, friendly and multinational atmosphere in a brand new modern office in the city centre,
home office opportunity in a hybrid way.
Gain profitable insights in software development and build your career at our partner as a Java developer!
What you need to do now
If you're interested in this role, click 'apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV, or call us now.
If this job isn't quite right for you but you are looking for a new position, please contact us for a confidential discussion on your career.

Senior IT projektvezető (Pápa)
Senior IT projektvezető (Pápa)
A hirdetés már lejárt!
Hire-One Személyzeti Tanácsadó Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
középvezető
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
távmunka, home office
angol - középfokú
Legyünk együtt sikeresek!
Partnerünk nemzetközi tulajdonban lévő, bővülő gyártó vállalat.
Részükre keresünk ÚJ kollégát, az alábbi pozícióba:
Senior IT projektvezető
Feladatok
A leendő kolléga IT projekteket fog koordinálni vagy részfeladatokat vállalni azokban: pl. logisztikai folyamatfejlesztések, ERP rendszerbevezetés és MES rendszerbevezetés;
Adatbázis szerver konfigurálása;
Lekérdezések készítése az ERP rendszerben, ill. a lekérdezések tesztelése;
ERP rendszer tesztelése;
MES rendszer fejlesztése, szorosan együttműködve a mérnökséggel;
Adatkinyerési módszerek kidolgozása, ezek tesztelése;
TISAX audit felkészülésben részvétel;
Projektköltségek figyelése.
Elvárások
Felsőfokú végzettség és releváns IT projektvezetői tapasztalat;
ERP és/vagy MES rendszerbevezetésben és/vagy IT rendszerek fejlesztésében szerzett tapasztalat;
Aktív angol nyelvtudás (sok esetben a megbeszélések ezen a nyelven lesznek);
Gyártó környezetben szerzett tapasztalat;
ERP rendszerek általános logisztikai folyamatainak ismerete.
Amit kínálunk
Work-life-balance, nem jellemző a túlóra és ha esetleg van is, akkor az kifizetésre kerül vagy lecsúsztatható;
Rugalmas munkaidő, törzsidővel;
Nettó 56 Ft/km útiköltség térítés;
13. havi bér;
Home-office lehetősége;
Képzési lehetőségek;
Egyéb juttatások (pl. dolgozói kedvezmények, Mikulás csomag, Húsvéti csomag);
Befogadó csapat.
Munkavégzés helye
Pápa
Jelentkezés módja
"Küldje el jelentkezését a „Jelentkezem az állásra most” gombra való kattintással! A fényképes önéletrajzokat magyar és idegen nyelven várjuk. Kérjük, a levél tárgyába írja be a pozíció nevét és a referencia számát. Köszönjük! Hire-One Személyzeti Tanácsadó Kft. Nyilvántartási szám: 3376-1/2008."

beosztott

angol - középfokú
Junior Java Developer
What you will do in the first three months:
Study the necessary technologies according to an individual development plan;
Practical study of new material;
Complete internship involving real projects with the application of the studied technologies
Our partner is a global supplier of software engineering and IT outsourcing services, and they are looking for a Junior PHP Developer. You’ll be part of a team of professionals who are ready to find the best tailor-made IT solutions for their multinational clients in various industries and solve complex problems.
You will be successful in this role if you have: 
Learnability, engineering thinking, positive mindset, and persistence to achieve the goal;
Confident technical English—ability to understand English documentation and formulate and express your thoughts in English;
Excellent knowledge of OOP, particularly in Java;
Working with database (relational or NoSQL) skills;
Principles of web applications and HTML and CSS knowledge;
Working with Git or other version control system skills;
Working with automatic project building system skills (maven, Gradle)
Will be a plus:
Knowledge of Spring and Hibernate frameworks;
Knowledge of JavaScript and basic frameworks such as Angular or React
We offer:
Stable long-term work environment;
Competitive salary with a flexible system of revisions;
Benefits and social packages;
Comfortable A+ office in Budapest;
Every necessary tool and device in the office will be provided to comfortably perform all project tasks: computers, meeting rooms, spacious modern kitchens with professional coffee machines, comfortable recreation areas with game consoles, board games, and a selection of literature for every taste;
Paid English courses and conversation clubs;
Opportunities for professional and personal growth;
Mentoring program, internal and external professional training programs;
Support and care from our client's friendly team
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest

Medior C fejlesztő - Svéd cég - CI, Networking - Folyékony angollal!
/*Munkalehetőség villághírű vállalatokkal - Inspiráló munkakörnyezet - Képzések, workshopok*/ Parnerünk egy svéd hátterű, multinacionális vállalat, komplex mérnöki megoldások egyik vezető globális szállítója. A vállalat 20 éve van jelen Magyarországon, fő tevékenységi köre a szoftverfejlesztés és -tesztelés, az információtervezés és -menedzsment, valamint beágyazott rendszerek fejlesztése. A budapesti csapat létszáma 220 fő. 6-8 fős Scrum csapatukba keresünk új fejlesztőt. Feladatok:
Multinacionális, funkcionalitáson átívelő agilis csapatban való munkavégzés
Részvétel az új funkciók tervezésében, megvalósításában
A termékek és folyamatok folyamatos fejlesztésének ösztönzése
Alapvető problémák kutatása és algoritmusok/megoldások végrehajtása
A termékek és folyamatok folyamatos fejlesztésének ösztönzése.
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest 1 nap iroda/hét + HO
Jelentkezem az állásra ›

Feliratkozás ›
Sikeres regisztráció!
Kérjük, aktiváld a felhasználói fiókodat: A megadott e-mail címre elküldtük a megerősítő linket.
Ezt követően feltöltheted az önéletrajzodat és beállíthatod, hogy milyen állásokról szeretnél értesítést kapni.
Sikeres álláskeresést kívánunk!
Sikeres regisztráció!
Köszönjük, hogy regisztráltál! Még aktiválnod kell a kiküldött e-mail-ben szereplő linkre kattintva! 
A nyereménysorsolásban csak aktivált fiókkal veszel részt. (Ha a beérkező levelek között nem találod, nézd meg a „Levélszemét” mappát is.)
Sikeres álláskeresést kívánunk!
Sikeres aktiválás!
Köszönjük, hogy aktiváltad Jobline fiókodat és Álláspostádat! Részt veszel a nyereménysorsolásban.
Töltsd fel önéletrajzodat a Jobline-ra, hogy MOBILON is jelentkezhess állásainkra, és hogy a munkaadók megtalálhassanak neked való állásajánlatokkal!
Sikeres álláskeresést kívánunk!
Új Állásposta beállítva!
Köszönjük, hogy új Álláspostát állítottál be, ezzel részt veszel a nyereménysorsoláson. A nyerteseket e-mailben értesítjük. 
Töltsd fel önéletrajzodat a Jobline-ra, hogy MOBILON is jelentkezhess állásainkra, és hogy a munkaadók megtalálhassanak neked való állásajánlatokkal!
Sikeres álláskeresést kívánunk!

System Administrator (Budapest)
System Administrator (Budapest)
A hirdetés már lejárt!
Hays Hungary Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Középfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
angol - felsőfokú
System Administrator
Your new company
Our partner has more than 40 years of research and development in the field of lottery systems made their company a worldwide leading supplier of lottery products.
If you want to
work closely with our customers
support the functional business units and software engineers to administer the customer’s system
enjoy the benefits of multi-shifts work order,
Your new role
Provision / operation of customer’s system 24/7
Current systems upkeep / care / maintenance / upgrades
Analysis and removal of occurring problems according to documentation
Performing backups and restores
Constant communication to involved units and partners
Reporting
What you'll need to succeed
You have solid knowledge of Linux systems, Oracle and Application Servers are advantages
You have experience in IP networking, virtualization and backup systems
Your knowledge of SAN, FC, storage systems is strong
Your work experience with server hardware is confident
You know what ITIL means
You would like to use your excellent English on a daily basis, good German is a plus
You work well under pressure and you are a team player
You want to enjoy the benefits of multi-shift work order (predictable and flexible shifting-plan)
You have minimum of 3 year’s relevant experience – Must have!
Bachelor degree is an advantage
What you'll get in return
Competitive payment package (13. and 14. months salaries, Home Office package)
Cafeteria and Health insurance
Mentoring Program, Trainings
Downtown office, in the heart of Budapest, at the foot of Buda castle (easily accessible by public transport)
Indoor bike and motorcycle storage
Recreation room: table soccer, darts and sauna
Team buildings
Excellent working atmosphere
Open company culture
Economically stable and growing enterprise
Non-conventional domain: lottery and sports games
What you need to do now
If you're interested in this role, click 'apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV, or call us now.
If this job isn't quite right for you but you are looking for a new position, please contact us for a confidential discussion on your career.

Snowflake Data Engineer (Budapest)
Snowflake Data Engineer (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Hays Hungary Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Snowflake Data Engineer
Would you like to work as a Data Engineer and you also like animal-friendly companies? Then you do not have to look any further, because Fressnapf is hiring an expert colleague to join its Data and Reporting Center as a Snowflake Data Engineer. 
What to expect
help building new data models on Snowflake 
participate in the transition of data from SAP to Snowflake
database development
drive various projects, liaise with various departments of the company to understand needs
using AFO create the Excel based reporting
supporting back and front end work using SQL
doing configurations in Azure
What convinces us
Extensive knowledge in the reporting field with confident technical skills and fluent English.
Technical skills:
Hands on knowledge of the Snowflake system as a developer
SQL Development or Matillion ETL experience is valuable
SQL experience for front and backend work
Excel knowledge: PowerPivot, PowerQuery, VBA
Power BI experience
Inmon/Kimball Star/Snowflake Data  Models, 3NF, Data Vault etc are highly valuable
Exposure to Azure is valuable
Experience as a tester, or ITIL, IIBA certificates are advantage
Soft skills:
Excellent team work
Agile, can-do attitude
Excellent English language skills
Precision, high level of detail
Ability to organise your time well, and can manage ad hoc requests if necessary
What we offer you
The love of animals is our Fressnapf DNA – if you have a dog, you can bring him/her to work with you
Unique corporate culture – with us you will experience openness, transparency and appreciation in an innovative, dynamic environment – because we love what we do
Here you can be YOU, the “you” culture will be used across entire company and across all hierarchical levels
An extremely successful business model in combination with permanent expansion and high growth, even in uncertain times
Work-life balance and flexible working hours – with us you have the opportunity use the advantages of mobile working
Because you deserve it! – Attractive remuneration as well as various additional services and benefits, e.g. employee discounts or cafeteria scheme, are a matter of course for us
Stay connected! – Cohesion is very important to us: with the employee app or digital
We Care! – The well-being of our employees is important to us
Your development is important to us – we support you with a wide range of learning opportunities
If you are interested in the position, please send us your up-to-date, English CV.

Software Test Engineer (Budapest)
Software Test Engineer (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Software Test Engineer
The following challenges await our new Software Test Engineer:
Execution of tests using HIL (Hardware-In-the-Loop) simulators in the field of conventional and hybrid truck transmissions
Manual and automated evaluation of measurements (using Vector tools such as CANape, CANalyzer; FAMOS)
Development and execution of automated tests
Documentation and presentation of test results
Improvement of tests and testing strategies
Collaboration in an international team
Our partner is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. With its comprehensive technology portfolio, the company offers integrated solutions for established vehicle manufacturers, mobility providers and start-up companies in the fields of transportation and mobility.
The requirements you should fulfill:
University/College degree in Vehicle Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mechatronics, Mechanical Engineering, or Computer Science
Good command of English and/or German, both written and spoken
Basic knowledge/understanding of coding, scripting, programming (Python, C, C#, C++ or other)
It's an advantage if you also have:
Experience in automotive function or system development
User-level knowledge of Matlab / Simulink, Vector tools (CANalyzer, CANape development tools)
Category C driving license
What our partner offers:
Participation in international projects and missions abroad
Training programs and language courses opportunities
Excellent workplace atmosphere and attractive working environment
Competitive salary, performance-related bonus and cafeteria
Different sports options
School start support
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest

Ariba Functional Admin (Budapest)
Ariba Functional Admin (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Ariba Functional Admin
This position will provide the GTS SPA organization with an experienced Ariba functional admin supporting our Ariba hosted instance. The selected candidate will be an excellent communicator with proven technical and analytical skills. This position is involved in functional support and day to day
maintenance of our Ariba instance. This includes working on request and incident tickets and supporting the agile team way of working. Functions for this include running agile ceremonies, updating the Jira board and creating new backlogs.
Responsibilities:
Work in a multi-national environment
Work on user requests and incidents as they are submitted
Work with the Product Owner on enhancements and vendor changes
Work in agile environment, including working on backlogs, and provide support to PO
Communication with various business units on request and issues
Be able to use problem solving skills in providing solutions
Work with business on analysis of requirements
Provide support for regulatory and compliance issues/requests
Work within documented change management process
Provide project support and oversight as needed
Aegon is a multinational financial services group headquartered in The Hague, the Netherlands. The company has multiple locations across the globe, with core markets in The Netherlands, UK and the US, growth markets in China, Brazil and Iberia and an Asset Management organization with locations in UK, US, NL and Hungary. Aegon Global Business Solution Center is supporting these businesses with IT, Finance, Risk, Model Validation, Actuarial, Audit and Asset management services with a growing team of approx. 300 people, based in Budapest, Hungary.
At Aegon, we foster a diverse workforce and an inclusive culture. We are a people business, and we recognize that delivering excellent client outcomes comes from harnessing distinct perspectives. We value diversity in the full range of human uniqueness without limitation, including race, gender, ability, language, culture, beliefs, age, origin, background, perspectives, and experiences.
Required Qualifications:
Bachelor’s degree or equivalent level
Minimum of 3 years work experience working in Ariba at level 1 or 2
Ariba Source to Pay and the following modules:
Buyer, including requisition/purchase order
Core Administration
SM Administration
User Manager
Supplier Lifecycle Performance
Supplier Risk
Guided Buying
Ariba Network
Approval flows
Invoicing
Invoice Reconciliation
Contract Terms
Receipt
Catalog and catalog from contracts
Upstream, including Contract Workspace, Sourcing Projects & Sourcing Events
Reporting
Skilled in English, both written and spoken
Regulatory experience preferred
Experience with Agile
Experience with Service Now, Confluence, Jira preferred
Problem solving skills
Good planning, prioritizing and goal setting skills
Ability to work independent and remote
The successful candidate will be self-motivated; service oriented and possesses excellent interpersonal and analytical skills. Candidate must have the ability to develop, coordinate, communicate, document, execute testing and implementation plans according to project requirements with minimal supervision.
In addition to the skills listed above, candidates must also demonstrate the following behaviors: team work; communication; tolerance of ambiguity; commitment to task; continuous learning; attention to detail; quality.
Competitive salary
Comprehensive health package
Brand new office at an excellent location
Hybrid working
Opportunities for growth and advancement
A highly people centric, positive and supportive work environment
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest

Senior fullstack fejlesztő - .NET/Angular - Elektronikai ipar - K+F
/* Világszínvonalú termékek - Befogadó és sokszínű munkakörnyezet - Rugalmas otthoni munkavégzés - Termékvásárlási kedvezmények */ Olyan munkahelyet keresel, ahol értékelik a képességeidet, a tapasztalatod, a lelkesedésed? Próbáld ki, mit érhetsz el ennél a cégnél, amely egyike a legnagyobb audiotechnikai és elektronikai berendezéseket gyártó nemzetközi vállalatoknak. Egy folyamatosan mozgásban lévő technológiai vezető vállalat, melyet innováció, befogadó környezet és csapatmunka jellemez. Tapasztalt fullstack fejlesztőt keresünk most csapatukba, ahol a következő generációs rendszerek alkalmazásainak kiépítésére lesz lehetőséged, K+F környezetben. Feladatok:
Professzionális új generációs felhő-, asztali- és mobilplatformok fejlesztése audio, és videorendszerekhez
Követelmények, specifikációk elemzése, tervek, end-to-end megoldások implementálása
Tesztelhető szoftverek készítése, unit és rendszertesztek készítése
Product Ownerekkel való együttműködés, a
nagy volumenű, kritikus fontosságú környezeteket támogató, nagymértékben skálázható szoftverek tervezése és megvalósítása érdekében
Részvétel a napi Scrum és egyéb Agilis tevékenységekben, Sprint tervezésekben
Együttműködés a csapat többi tagjával
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest + HO

Feladatok:
Android alkalmazások és könyvtárak fejlesztése csapatban, ahol mindig van saját felelősségi kör is
Projekt tervezési feladataiba való bekapcsolódás lehetősége

Java Developer (Budapest)
Java Developer (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Java Developer
Tasks:
Commercial Software Engineers are T-shaped professionals.
As Commercial Software Engineer, you take care of specification, design, engineering, testing, delivering, deploying, maintaining, and supporting digital products.
The ability to deliver code in one or more programming languages is at the core of the job.
As a T-shaped professional you brings deep expertise in one or more crafts and proficiency in other crafts.
In the product team, the Commercial Software Engineers together secure all the skills, knowledge and experience on analysis, design and architecture, development, quality assurance, DevOps, LCM and operational support as needed.
Depending on the service level agreements (SLA) the Commercial Software Engineer can be asked to participate in consignation duties, for example if 24/7 support is agreed. 
We value both technical expertise (analysis, design and architecture, engineering, quality assurance and DevPps) as well as the interpersonal parts of the job (coaching, consulting, coordination, and support).
Our Client is a leading European airline. Their IT is a strong mature agile organization with over 1.000 internal employees worldwide – but they are starting fresh in Budapest with a new start-up this year.
Are you looking for a chance to work in truly European spirit with their future technological developments?
Together you fly 110 aircraft to 145 destinations, bringing millions of passengers to where they need to be, developing sustainable travel and pushing the boundaries of air travel towards to the future.
Skills:
Bachelor or Master degree level or higher in Computer Science, Software Engineering or other relevant fields through study or IT experience
2 - 4 years of experience building production-grade software
3 years of expertise in Java/J2EE, Spring, Spring Boot, Kotlin, Knowledge of API management, handling SOAP services and REST API, Hibernate, Maven, Docker, Kubernetes, Groovy, Git, Jenkins, Ready API
Identity and Access Management, Storn in Oauth 2, good knowledge in application and endpoint security
Experience with Unit testing, Contract based testing, release-on-demand concepts and automated build tools (e.g. Bamboo)
Code Quality maintenance ( Sonar, Performance/LOAD Testing , Integration Testing , Security Scanning )
Being able to engineer for Azure
Practical experience and a strong theoretical basis for dealing with complex architectures
Curiosity to discover the complex domain processes
Proactive attitude
Good communication skills, written and spoken (English)
Great team player that can work well as part of a diverse, international team
Agile mindset
Nice to have:
OPEN ID connect, microservices, DevOps CICD, Mongo DB, Redis cache, Dynatrace, Oracle PL/SQL,
Java script, Message brokers Active and Kafka
A challenging role at an unique employer in the Netherlands
Plenty of room for personal development and wonderful career opportunities
A good pension scheme, end of the year bonus, and profit sharing
Great discounts on airline tickets (if you have been in service for at least 6 months)
A travel expenses scheme and a quarterly duty trip to Amsterdam
Discount on your health insurance
A personal budget for sustainable employability
Munkavégzés helye:
Budapest

Confident Role
We are looking for an IT Engineering Manager with the profile below.
Our IT Engineering team is responsible for the development, operation and support of a variety of internal tools, either developed in-house or third-party ones. Part of the team fulfils a global function and supports users globally. This part of the team is technically lead by managers in the parent company (based in Liechtenstein).
Roles and responsibilities:
- Line management of all members of the IT Engineering Team
- Technical leadership of the team
- Liaison with technical counterparts from the parent company based in Liechtenstein
- Own and develop the technical strategy of the team
- Project portfolio management
- Project management of high profile projects
- Development of the team
- Performance management of the team
- Regular reporting to the Head of IT
Must have requirements:
- Solid people management skills
- Performance management experience at team level and at individual level
- Project management experience
- Good communication skills with different (technical, non-technical) parties and at the right level of detail
- Ability to communicate a vision to the team
- General IT background
- Background both in software engineering and operational topics
- Exposure to Agile methodologies
- Experience with Linux (command line)
- Experience with relational databases
- Understanding how support organisations work
- Can do attitude
- Problem solving
- Can perform under pressure
- Good English (written and oral)
- University degree or equivalent
- Willingness to travel occasionally
Nice to have requirements:
- German language
- Work experience in an international environment
- Experience with CI/CD
- Experience with container orchestration

Software Engineering Manager (Budapest)
Software Engineering Manager (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Hays Hungary Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
középvezető
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Software Engineering Manager
Our international partner is looking for a talented Software Engineering Manager to join their growing team. The candidate will have excellent leadership skills for teams and engineering, and report to the Senior Operations Manager. She/He will work on the management, execution, design, software development and releases of our world-class electric mobility control and interface systems.
Key Accountabilities / Responsibilities:
Lead a software team developing safety-critical and mobility-focused embedded software
Lead new strategies and develop adaptions to existing algorithms for vehicle motion control, user interfaces, API's, actuator and energy management with the software development team
Manage implementation of systems tests, debugging and diagnostics and analyse resulting data
Manage a team planning, designing, and optimizing automated test cases and CI/CD pipelines with the software test team
Participate in design and code reviews within our software development lifecycle
Generate and analyse requirements and specifications from stakeholders
Collaborate with other software engineers, electrical, mechanical, systems, and product teams to deliver solutions
Requirements
An Engineering or Computer Science degree, or equivalent experience
A passionate interest in electric transport and an interest in developing new generations of electric vehicles
Proven experience in building and releasing production software packages in ECU's or controllers in relevant engineering projects
Proficiency in embedded software development in C/C++, and model-based development in Simulink
Proficiency with automotive or industrial communications such as CAN and Ethernet
Experience with the v-model automotive software development lifecycle
Experience with software functional safety implementations and preferably, ISO26262 certifications
Strong understanding of vehicle dynamics, control theory and sensors
Enjoy working in a fast-paced and growing global team environment
Ability to work independently with a strong team ethos
Capable of mentoring engineers in the software engineering domain
Minimum of 15 years of experience in software development in industry
Proficient in Hungarian and English
Other useful experience
A general knowledge of embedded electronics development and the ability to read schematic diagrams
Understanding of the standards of functional safety ISO26262, IEC61508 and/or ASIL
Technical experience related to electronic systems at a component, sub-system and system level
An ability to analyse test results, highlight abnormalities and present outcomes to an audience with a range of technical expertise
Cross functional knowledge across the disciplines of electronics, mechatronics, and software
Experienced with Microsoft Office suite
Strong interpersonal and communication skills
Benefits
Work at an exciting technology company within Hungary delivering globally in a multi-national group
Enjoy a clear sense of ownership in your field, with the satisfaction of working on developments that create the future of a new category of autonomous vehicles
Work alongside a friendly and passionate team on cutting edge technology
Have the opportunity to travel to other company offices including Australia and the UK
Enjoy modern office space and great work environment

People Lead - Devops (REF1105J)

Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions -
Head of Team - Hyperscaler (REF1557F)
Randstad Hungary Kft -

Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions -

DevOps Lead (Debrecen/Budapest) (Magyarország)
DevOps Lead (Debrecen/Budapest) (Magyarország)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
középvezető
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
DevOps Lead
The DevOps lead will be responsible for leading and guiding a team of devops engineers across IST, HU and CST timezones
They must have proven leadership experience and be able to coach and grow their team whilst also being hands on and able to troubleshoot issues, unblock the team and
think about long term vision of the area/what needs to be improved
Our international client is looking for a motivated and dynamic DevOps Lead to join their team.
Our partner is a strategic supplier to all restaurants, deploying in over 120 countries and over 37,500 locations worldwide. They provide software development, testing, deployment and support services for POS (point-of-sale) and related software applications that focus on the overall crew and customer experience, resulting in improved operations in the restaurants.
This role is a leadership role but also hands on - both are required
Must be an expert/have proven high level experience in AWS and all respective components
Must have proven experience and high expertise in terraform and using AWS as a cloud provider. IAC is a must
Strong knowledge in containers and container orchestration. Must be very strong in Kubernetes
Very strong understanding of CI/CD, ideally Jenkins as a tool of choice
Skilled in one or more programming languages such as Python, Ruby etc
Understanding of Java preferable but not mandatory
Thorough understanding of source control, git and trunk based dev
Experience in monitoring and dashboards, ideally new relic
Working knowledge of consul and Vault
Leadership/Softskills:
Able to lead, coach and mentor engineers of various levels of ability
Be comfortable presenting and teaching
Must be able to think about the bigger picture and create a roadmap/vision for
improving the area
International team made of young and dynamic people, who like to keep work-life balance in mind
Remote work opportunity with only a few days a month in the office
Trainings, conferences, language courses, and sport opportunities

SAP Consultant
Tasks:
Supporting onsite three manufacturing sites coordinating projects related to SAP developments
Requirements assessment related to SAP-PP and SAP-MM modules
Transferring the current status and needs to the developers, then discussing the feasibility of the plans
Preparation of specifications (business blueprint), coordinating the implementation and customization processes
Participating in the development of functional design and configuration
Stakeholder management, project tracking, scheduling and follow-up 
Examining occurring ad-hoc issues, proposing actions to solve them 
Completing the roll-out process, conducting go-live, integrating the finished product into the client's systems
Follow-up, support and incident management duties after the delivery phase
Taking part in global SAP projects, in alignment with the global IT strategies 
Our partner is a market leader international company  with a stable history We are currently looking for an SAP Consultant supporting three manufacturing units.
Requirements:
1-3 years of SAP experience (SAP-PP, SAP-MM)
Experience in ABAP / ABAP-OO
Experience in customizing processes
Fluency in English 
“B” category driving license is a must for traveling to manufacturing sites 
Industrial process knowledge
Advantages:
Experience in SAP SCM (APO)
Offer:
Multinational environment, global responsibilities
Stable, market-leading corporate background
Competitive salary, bonus and other benefits
2 days Home Office / week
Democratic, open and direct corporate culture
Outstanding professional development opportunities, in-house career plan
Positive attitude, dynamic team

SAP OTC/SD Consultant (Budapest)
SAP OTC/SD Consultant (Budapest)
A hirdetés már lejárt!
Hays Hungary Kft.
Alapvető elvárások

5+ év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség

angol - középfokú
SAP OTC/SD Consultant
Your new company 
Would you like to boost your career in an international environment as a SAP SD Consultant?
Our partner company uses innovation and technology to deliver energy to our world and they are looking for a SAP SD Consultant to join to their 9 people team in Budapest and other colleagues globally. You will work both on projects as well base support enhancements by providing consultation and design services in response to requests.
Your new role 
consult end-users and business partners, coordinate with internal and 3rd party developers,
support in solving / implementing / maintaining complex projects, business requests/ projects, system & application enhancements,
work in a local Scrum team, part of a global organization,
collaborate in further assignments as opportunity arise i.e., safety, control,
being a mentor for new team members, provide knowledge transfer.
What you'll need to succeed:
5+ years of experience in the below skillsets
Confidence with SAP OTC/SD modules
Fluent English knowledge in written and verbal
Desired Technical Skills:
Experience in ABAP Development, to perform debugging
Agile practices (as life cycle methodologies)
General Logic Diagrams
Application Design
What you need to do now
If you're interested in this role, click 'apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV, or call us now.
If this job isn't quite right for you but you are looking for a new position, please contact us for a confidential discussion on your career.

Junior/Medior/Senior/Lead Szoftver tesztautomatizáló mérnök (Budapest)
Junior/Medior/Senior/Lead Szoftver tesztautomatizáló mérnök (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
Gyártás, műszaki terület
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
Szoftver tesztautomatizáló mérnök
Feladatok
A XI. kerületben található modern irodaházunkban kreatív környezetben dolgozhatsz, ahol sok színes közösségi tér, saját moziterem és egy skybar is vár
Rugalmas munkaidővel és home office lehetőséggel támogatunk (a legtöbb területen a havi munkaidő 60%-a)
Versenyképes fizetést és széleskörű juttatásokat (cafeteria és bónusz) biztosítunk számodra
Részese lehetsz egy sikeres, gyorsan növekvő technológiai vállalatnak
Új nyelveket tanulhatsz nálunk (5 nyelv közül választhatsz)
Szabadidős programokon kapcsolódhatsz ki (társasjátékok, sportolási lehetőség)
Ügyfelünk multinacionális háttérrel rendelkezik, ezáltal számos országban képviselteti magát. Légy részese egy olyan több mint 20 éves sikertörténetnek, amely Budapestről indult és vált nemzetközi szinten is egy meghatározó fejlesztési központtá az Ügyfelünk részeként. 
Elvárások
Beágyazott mikrokontrolleres rendszerek programjainak funkcionális és biztonsági ellenőrzésére szolgáló automatizált hardware-in-the-loop tesztek fejlesztése
A szoftvertesztek megtervezése, implementálása pythonban, futtatása, teszt naplók analízise, a tesztek karbantartása
Új szoftvertesztelési technológiák, módszerek és eljárások kidolgozása
A tesztelési dokumentáció elkészítése, átvizsgálása és karbantartása
Részvétel az szoftvertervezési dokumentácó átvizsgálásában
Folyamatos együttműködés a szoftverfejlesztőkkel, a problémák hatékony megoldásának támogatása
Amit kínálunk
Versenyképes fizetés és széles körű juttatások
Részvétel nemzetközi projektekben
Folyamatos szakmai fejlődést biztosító, sikeres és gyorsan növekvő vállalat
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest

T&E and Financial Master Data Specialist
Purchasing card statement report and FB60 form preparation
Managing Concur approvals
Keeping contact with management
Preparing delinquency report
Travel card activation and deactivation
Managing internal stakeholder queries in a timely manner
Prepare accruals
Maintaining MDM processes
Resolving data migration issues
Preparing monthly KPI metrics
Our international partner, among the world's top 5 life science companies, is looking for a Senior T&E and Financial Master Data Specialist with fluent English skills.
3-5 years of Operational experience and/or functional understanding of Operations from Corporate, Regional, and local perspectives while maintaining a customer and/or vendor focus
SAP and MDM system experience preferred
Fluent English is essential. Any other European language is an advantage.
Intermediate to advance knowledge of Excel
Concur and SAP system knowledge is a must-have
Commitment to teamwork through relationship-building, reliability, and collaboration
Strong organizational skills and the ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously with high accuracy and attention to detail.
A dynamic environment where your innovative ideas are always welcome 
A collaborative community where your professional goals and work are supported by encouraging supervisors 
Competitive salary and cafeteria 
Annual bonus 
Private Health Care Services – unlimited examinations, checkups in numerous specialties free of charge 
Life and accident insurance 
Employee Referral Program with remarkable referral bonus 
Hybrid working model

Software Engineer (Budapest)
Software Engineer (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
5+ év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
távmunka, home office
angol - középfokú
Software Engineer
Deliver end-to-end tasks towards a larger goal with minimal assistance from more senior team members.Produce completed work of consistently high quality, demonstrating most or all of the hallmarks of fleshed-out client's engineering artifacts.Plan and execute prioritized project work independently, managing their own priorities and making appropriately paced progress without supervision.Participate in design, though often with guidance.ChallengeIdentify technical problems with requirements and fix them, helping the team to course-correct when necessary.Address commonly escalated issues or triage when required.May proactively spot and suggest areas of future work for self and team.InfluenceWork within one or more teams to communicate knowledge related to broad set of tasks.Identify key stakeholders and contribute to cross-team collaboration.Coordinate timelines, goals, and objectives for assigned project component(s), understanding how work fits in with related projects or components, including dependencies and upstream/downstream implications.ExpertiseDemonstrate the development of at least one major skill outside of core coding (e.g., reliability monitoring and alerting, security and privacy practices and techniques, ensuring implementation choices support product inclusion and lead to equitable and inclusive user outcomes, documentation, integration testing, production hygiene and support processes), and an understanding of related areas of client.Responsibilities under the direction of manager:Code writing, testing & reviewWrite product or system development code for tasks with minimal assistance, conduct testing on code, design code to allow for easy testing (e.g., dependency injection), write test case descriptions to ensure coverage of critical components, review code developed by other engineers and provide feedback to ensure best practices (e.g., style guidelines, checking code in, accuracy, testability, and efficiency).Engineering excellence, documentation & debuggingSet up or improve test/monitoring/survey infrastructure or processes to ensure code health and consider system maintainability and scalability over time, contribute to existing documentation or educational content and adapt content based on product/program updates and user feedback, triage product or system issues and debug/track/resolve by analyzing the sources of issues and the impact on hardware, network, or service operations and quality.
Our client is an American multinational company focusing on online advertising, search engine technology, cloud computing, computer software, quantum computing, e-commerce, artificial intelligence, and consumer electronics.
approximately 5-7 years of experience. 
expertise in Angular (with TypeScript or JavaScript) 
eager to contribute to future success in Cloud AI. 
additional proficiency with Python, Java, C++, or Go is preferred 
Attractive compensation package
Private Medical Care Program
Flexible work arrangements
Continuous career progression
An inclusive and friendly corporate culture with diverse networking opportunities

Senior React fejlesztő - Banki projekt
/* Banki projekt - React - Legújabb technológiák - Zöldmezős fejlesztés */
Partnerünk egy több, mint 20 éve tevékenykedő magyar cég. Magyar és nyugat-európai nagyvállalatoknak nyújt megoldást szoftverfejlesztési területen. Hosszútávú banki projektjükhöz keresünk most új kollegákat.
Zöldmezős fejlesztés, legújabb technológiák, legkorszerűbb architektúra!
Feladatok:
Banki szoftverfejlesztés React keretrendszerben, cross-functional Agilis csapat tagjaként
Szoros együttműködés a Product Owner-ekkel és a többi csapattaggal
Tervezés és időbecslés a user story-k alapján
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest, 4. kerület + HO

Cloud Platform Engineer
Tasks
Responsible for Platform operations, Platform support, Infrastructure deployment in Microsoft Azure environment.
Implement Container services with Platform (AKS)
Implement new platform functionalities to enhance platform capabilities
Work with Cloud Security team to implement security of platform including Firewall, Networking, NSG rules.
Azure Monitoring, Scaling, Availability, and performance/Utilization measurement
Coordinate for Backups, updates & maintenance for onPrem solutions
Our Client is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility.
4-6 years Strong Technical experience in supporting and implementing Azure DevOps CI/CD pipelines for Databricks, Azure ML, AKS etc
Strong experience with Azure Cloud infrastructure e.g deploying infrastructure, Networking, Security, Firewall etc.
Strong experience with Terraform/PowerShell/ARM scripting.
Strong Experience with Microsoft Azure Virtual Machine, Log Analytics and Express Route.
Stable company background and long-term working possibility
Full of challenges and high-level professional activities at an international company
Offer:
Participation in international projects and commission to foreign countries
Career opportunities, continuous training program and language courses
Competitive salary and performance-related bonus
Cafeteria with optional elements
